powerAddons.name: Prayer Tablet Fragment
powerAddons.description:
A fragmented stone tablet with a corrupted incantation originally used to purge illnesses and feelings of general malaise.
Increases Object Infection duration by +40 seconds.
Increases Infection gained from infected Objects by +100 %.
Grants 100 % Bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.
Vile Purge no longer affects Survivors directly.

powerAddons.name: Olibanum Incense
powerAddons.description:
Precious resin extracted from Boswellia trees, used during ceremonies for their sweet citrusy fragrance.
The Auras of Survivors cleansing at Pools of Devotion are revealed for 4 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Limestone Seal
powerAddons.description:
A cylindrical seal made from porous stone that displays a ritualistic scene with winged deities.
Increases Object Infection duration by +20 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Healing Salve
powerAddons.description:
A bitterly pungent paste of crushed roots, which were marinated in fish brine for three days and in wine for two.Applied on skin rashes.
Reduces Cool-down time of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by -0.25 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Prophylactic Amulet
powerAddons.description:
A soapstone amulet crudely engraved with a winged deity that wards off sickness.Fills the wearer with devotion.
Decreases available Pools of Devotion by -2.

powerAddons.name: Potent Tincture
powerAddons.description:
A frothing, murky liquid that permeates the air with an acute aroma of herbs and alcohol. Applied directly on blisters.
Reduces Cool-down time of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by -0.4 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Haematite Seal
powerAddons.description:
A cylindrical seal forged from a metallic hard-stone, engraved with bird-headed beings that stood next to strange machines.Used as a container for sanctified ashes.
Increases Object Infection duration by +30 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Emetic Potion
powerAddons.description:
A mustard-water based syrup that induces vomiting when consumed.Used to purge evil from the body.
Increases effectiveness of Vile Purge by +30 %.

powerAddons.name: Blessed Apple
powerAddons.description:
A perfectly ripe fruit to break fast during the purification ceremony.Delicious.
Start the Trial with 1 Pool of Devotion already corrupted.

powerAddons.name: Rubbing Oil
powerAddons.description:
A beaker of rubbing oil with expectorant quality.Exudes the evergreen scent of laurel and rosemary.
Increases Charge rate of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by +50 %.

powerAddons.name: Infected Emetic
powerAddons.description:
A disgusting syrup of unknown origin.The thick yellow liquid is consumed to induce vomiting.Used to purge evil from the body.
Increases effectiveness of Vile Purge by +40 %.

powerAddons.name: Incensed Ointment
powerAddons.description:
A dark waxy paste, laced with cedar sap that diffuses a sweet and earthy aroma.Applied directly on infected skin.
Ingesting Corruption causes all Survivors within The Plague's Terror Radius to scream and reveal their locations.

powerAddons.name: Exorcism Amulet
powerAddons.description:
An obsidian amulet to ward off sickness during exorcism rituals. Inscribed with a prayer to the God of Mayhem and Pestilence.Fills the wearer with fierce devotion.
Increases duration of Corrupt Purge by +10 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Ashen Apple
powerAddons.description:
A peeled apple rolled into sanctified ashes.Eating such a fruit warded off the malignantly envious spirits of the deceased.
Start the Trial with 1 Pool of Devotion already corrupted.
Increases available Pools of Devotion by +1.

powerAddons.name: Worship Tablet
powerAddons.description:
A stone tablet adorned with gold, showing the drawings and writings of a corrupted incantation used originally to worship forgotten deities.
Increases Ingestion speed by +100 %.
Increases Movement speed while holding Corrupt Purge by +4.4 %.

powerAddons.name: Vile Emetic
powerAddons.description:
A foul-smelling and half-congealed potion of unidentifiable ingredients.Consumed to rapidly induce vomiting.Used to purge evil from the body.
Increases Projectile speed of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by +10 %.

powerAddons.name: Severed Toe
powerAddons.description:
The decaying severed toe of Adiris, weaved on a thread and worn as an amulet around the neck.Radiates with vile power.
Increases Infection gained from interacting with Objects by +50 %.

powerAddons.name: Devotee's Amulet
powerAddons.description:
A blood stone amulet carved intricately with the effigy of the Babylonian God of Mayhem and Pestilence.Fills the wearer with boundless devotion.
Increases duration of Corrupt Purge by +20 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Iridescent Seal
powerAddons.description:
A translucent cylindrical seal moulded from The Fog itself with the effigy of The Plague.Its surface is warm and pulsates with The Entity's power.
Each time a Generator is completed, The Plague is automatically granted Corrupt Purge.
Reduces duration of Corrupt Purge by -20 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Black Incense
powerAddons.description:
A dark paste made of sharp osseous shavings.The inhaling of its foul fumes sharpens the mind's eye.
The Auras of infected Survivors are revealed to you for 3 seconds when they vomit.

powerAddons.name: Jewel Beetle
powerAddons.description:
A beautiful and valuable insect.While difficult to capture, it is worth a pretty penny.
Decreases the Virulent Bound extension when grabbing a Survivor mid-Bound by -50 %.
Grants 100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Virulent Bound Score Events.

powerAddons.name: Unicorn Medallion
powerAddons.description:
An old medallion depicting a majestic unicorn.It was placed in storage for years.
Increases the initial Virulent Bound distance by +20 %.
Decreases the subsequent Virulent Bound distance by -20 %.

powerAddons.name: R.P.D. Shoulder Walkie
powerAddons.description:
Without the ability to communicate, the cops of Raccoon City are isolated and don’t stand a chance.
Decreases the initial Virulent Bound distance by -20 %.
Increases the subsequent Virulent Bound distance by +20 %.

powerAddons.name: Uroboros Tendril
powerAddons.description:
The result of decades of Bio Organic Weapon research.It will not rest until it has swallowed the entire world.
Increases The Mastermind's Movement speed while charging Virulent Bound by +5 %.

powerAddons.name: Loose Crank
powerAddons.description:
To the person whose only tool is a crank, the whole world looks like a crank-shaped hole.
Increases The Mastermind's Movement speed between the first and second Virulent Bounds by +8 %.

powerAddons.name: Leather Gloves
powerAddons.description:
Gloves of a cold, calculating schemer.They impart an air of icy professionalism.
Decreases the Virulent Bound Recharge time by -10 %.

powerAddons.name: Lion Medallion
powerAddons.description:
An old medallion depicting a brave lion.It was made when the Raccoon Police Station was still an art museum.
Increases the distance at which Survivors are thrown by +30 %.

powerAddons.name: Chalice (Gold)
powerAddons.description:
A chalice of pure gold used to celebrate the summer solstice.
Increases the Virulent Bound extension when grabbing a Survivor mid-Bound by +50 %.

powerAddons.name: Bullhorn
powerAddons.description:
The commands screamed into this device riled up some and disoriented others.
Survivors that use the First Aid Spray suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 30 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Portable Safe
powerAddons.description:
A small container that requires a complicated combination to unlock.
Survivors injured by Virulent Bound suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until fully healed.

powerAddons.name: Red Herb
powerAddons.description:
Acts as a reagent that strengthens the effect of that with which it is combined.
Increases the time it takes for Survivors to use a First Aid Spray by 2 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Maiden Medallion
powerAddons.description:
A medallion depicting a beautiful maiden.Its purpose was unknown for many years.
When a Survivor becomes Critically Infected, they suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Video Conference Device
powerAddons.description:
Many intricate conspiracies were orchestrated on devices just like this one.
Increases the passive Infection Gain rate by +30 %.

powerAddons.name: Egg (Gold)
powerAddons.description:
A highly coveted foodstuff.The cash worth is second only to its regenerative effects.
Increases the duration of the additional Virulent Bound Window by +50 %.

powerAddons.name: Dark Sunglasses
powerAddons.description:
Glasses enhanced with AR that grant the wearer an invaluable advantage on the battlefield.
When a Survivor becomes Critically Infected, gain the Undetectable Status Effect for 20 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Green Herb
powerAddons.description:
A common plant, usually known for its restorative properties.
Increases the Infection rate when grabbing a Survivor during a Virulent Bound by +30 %.

powerAddons.name: Helicopter Stick
powerAddons.description:
Debris from a helicopter crash.Few jobs are more dangerous than a helicopter pilot’s when Wesker is involved.
When a Survivor uses a First Aid Spray, reveal their Aura for 8 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Uroboros Virus
powerAddons.description:
For some, the strength and resistance was worth the trade-off.
When a Survivor becomes Critically Infected, reveal their Aura for 4 seconds.
"The balance of the world is changing… and you're completely oblivious to it." — Ricardo Irving

powerAddons.name: Lab Photo
powerAddons.description:
Wesker was as much a researcher as he was a guinea pig for Umbrella's bio-weapons.
Destroy Pallets and Breakable Walls when colliding while using Virulent Bound.
Removes the ability to vault Pallets while using Virulent Bound.
"Only a handful of humans truly matter. Everyone else is just so much chaff. So now I have to separate this chaff from the wheat." — Albert Wesker

powerAddons.name: Iridescent Uroboros Vial
powerAddons.description:
The perfect bio-weapon.Decades of research have led to this.
Survivors start the Trial Infected with Uroboros.
Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 30 seconds when becoming Critically Infected.
"The entire world will be infected. A new Genesis is at hand and I will be the creator!" — Albert Wesker

powerAddons.name: Shattered Syringe
powerAddons.description:
Symbol of a broken way of life.Reminiscing about her past-self hardens her determination.
Reduces the Cool-down time of missed Ambush Dash Attacks by -25 %.

powerAddons.name: John's Medical File
powerAddons.description:
The medical file of a cancerous man.Fills the reader with dread and recklessness.
Increases Crouch Movement speed by +6 %.

powerAddons.name: Interlocking Razor
powerAddons.description:
A modification to the Jigsaw Box:The addition of interlocking razor blades makes it impossible to move suddenly in the Jigsaw Box without slitting one's wrists.
Failing a Skill Check at Jigsaw Boxes will apply Deep Wound Status Effect to Injured Survivors.

powerAddons.name: Combat Straps
powerAddons.description:
Leather straps that hold fabric in place for nimbler movement.
Increases the Crouch State Transitioning speed by +30 %.

powerAddons.name: Workshop Grease
powerAddons.description:
A simple tube of grease, used to lubricate the mechanisms of the hidden blade.
Increases the Charge speed of the Ambush Dash by +50 %.
Reduces the Cool-down time of missed Ambush Dash Attacks by -25 %.

powerAddons.name: Utility Blades
powerAddons.description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:Sharp blades attached to the Trap's interior lacerate the victim with every movement.
Survivors caught in a Reverse Bear Trap suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect.

powerAddons.name: Razor Wires
powerAddons.description:
A modification to the Jigsaw Box:The addition of razor sharp wires makes it extra difficult and potentially painful to search them.
Failing a Skill Check at Jigsaw Boxes will injure Healthy Survivors.
Increases the difficulty of Skill Checks by +20 %.

powerAddons.name: Last Will
powerAddons.description:
A latched wooden box with a satin lining, offered as part of a last will.
Increases Movement speed during an Ambush Dash by +6 %.
Increases the Charge time of Ambush Dash by +33 %.

powerAddons.name: Face Mask
powerAddons.description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:The heavy cloth face mask, laced with a sedative, partially suffocates the target, making it hard to concentrate.
Survivors caught in a Reverse Bear Traps suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.
Face Mask does not hide the Auras of the Jigsaw Boxes.

powerAddons.name: Slow-Release Toxin
powerAddons.description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:A poison that is not fatal, but weakens the body and makes it nearly impossible to recover fully from any effort.
Survivors caught in a Reverse Bear Trap suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect.

powerAddons.name: Rusty Attachments
powerAddons.description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:Mouth spikes, covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that make injuries particularly difficult to heal.
Injured Survivors caught in a Reverse Bear Trap suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.

powerAddons.name: Rules Set No.2
powerAddons.description:
Not all games need to have the same rules.
Disables the Survivors' ability to see the Auras of Jigsaw Boxes until their Reverse Bear Trap is activated.
"Listen, there are rules." — Jigsaw

powerAddons.name: Jigsaw's Annotated Plan
powerAddons.description:
A disturbing, yet brilliant, trap design laid down on paper and annotated by Jigsaw.
Increases available Reverse Bear Traps by +1 Trap.
Each time a Generator is completed, the Death Timer of all active Reverse Bear Traps is reduced by -10 seconds.
Increases the default Death Timer duration by +10 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Bag of Gears
powerAddons.description:
A few mechanical parts that allow the creation of challenging Jigsaw Boxes and easier to install Reverse Bear Traps.
Increases the Attaching speed of Reverse Bear Traps by +50 %.
Decreases the Search speed of Jigsaw Boxes by -14 %.

powerAddons.name: Tampered Timer
powerAddons.description:
A timer that has been fiddled with.A spring in the mechanism forces the gears to turn faster.
Reduces the default Death Timer duration of Reverse Bear Trap by -20 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Jigsaw's Sketch
powerAddons.description:
A disturbing, yet brilliant, trap design sketched in detail on a sheet of paper.
Increases available Reverse Bear Traps by +1 Trap.
Whenever a Survivor wearing a Reverse Bear Trap is repairing a Generator that Generator's Aura is highlighted to you.

powerAddons.name: Crate of Gears
powerAddons.description:
This collection of mechanical parts allows the creation of extra-challenging Jigsaw Boxes and Reverse Bear Traps that are easier to install.
Increases the Attaching speed of Reverse Bear Traps by +50 %.
Decreases the Search speed of Jigsaw Boxes by -25 %.

powerAddons.name: Amanda's Secret
powerAddons.description:
A black metal box containing a knife and various medical supplies, such as bandages and compresses.Deep cuts reduce stress and awaken the senses.
Survivors removing their Reverse Bear Trap trigger a Loud Noise Notification
Survivors removing their Reverse Bear Trap have their Aura revealed to you for 6 seconds.
Disables your ability to see the Auras of Jigsaw Boxes.

powerAddons.name: Amanda's Letter
powerAddons.description:
A blackmailing Letter for the attention of Amanda.Fills the reader with rage and focus.
When crouched, the Auras of all Survivors within 16 metres are revealed to you.
Reduces available Reverse Bear Traps by -2 Traps.
"Amanda, you were with Cecil the night Jill lost Gideon. You killed their child. You know it and I know it." — Amanda's Letter

powerAddons.name: Video Tape
powerAddons.description:
A recording of Jigsaw, explaining the game's rules to Amanda.Reminiscing about her past-self hardens her determination.
All Survivors start the Trial with Reverse Bear Traps installed.

powerAddons.name: Yellowed Cloth
powerAddons.description:
A simple scrap of material to tend to blisters and wipe the puss away.
Increases the Flight speed of Hatchets by +10 %.

powerAddons.name: Coarse Stone
powerAddons.description:
This stone is too coarse to do any good.A blade damaged by it inflicts awful open wounds.
Increases the volume of Survivors' Grunts of Pain by +50 % until they are healed, if they are hit by Hatchets.

powerAddons.name: Bandaged Haft
powerAddons.description:
First-aid bandages securely rolled and attached to the Hatchet's haft.
Reduces Cool-down duration in-between Hatchet Throws by -10 %.

powerAddons.name: Amanita Toxin
powerAddons.description:
A toxin from the Amanita mushroom, applied to the Hatchet's blade.It numbs the mind.
Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Weighted Head
powerAddons.description:
An oddly weighted Hatchet head, crafted to deliver a hard blow to its target.It requires a wielder with a strong arm.
Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Incapacitated Status Effect for 10 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Shiny Pin
powerAddons.description:
A copper pin defaced beyond recognition yet polished to a high sheen.Pillaged from a particularly difficult prey.
Increases Movement speed during Wind-up by +5 %.

powerAddons.name: Oak Haft
powerAddons.description:
A polished haft which allows for a quick and sly manipulation of the deadly tool.
Reduces Cool-down duration in-between Hatchet Throws by -20 %.

powerAddons.name: Manna Grass Braid
powerAddons.description:
A circular decorative braid made from manna grass.This memory of a lost little one fills The Huntress with rage and focus.
Reduces Wind-up time by -8 %.

powerAddons.name: Leather Loop
powerAddons.description:
This leather strip tied into a loop can be attached to a belt to allow easy transportation of tools.
Start the Trial with 1 additional Hatchet.
Grants the ability to carry 1 additional Hatchet.

powerAddons.name: Venomous Concoction
powerAddons.description:
A toxic concoction, applied to the Hatchet's blade.The murky concoction is mainly composed of Berus Snake venom, which gives it fatiguing capabilities.
Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Rusty Head
powerAddons.description:
This Hatchet head is covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that make injuries particularly difficult to heal from.
Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.
Rusty Head does not stack.

powerAddons.name: Rose Root
powerAddons.description:
Dried petals that relieve symptoms of fatigue and overexertion when brewed in a tea.
Increases the Flight speed of Hatchets by +20 %.

powerAddons.name: Flower Babushka
powerAddons.description:
A clean and colourful handkerchief adorned with a flower pattern.This memory of a lost little one fills The Huntress with rage and focus.
Reduces Wind-up time by -12 %.

powerAddons.name: Deerskin Gloves
powerAddons.description:
Cured leather gloves that protect the hands and give a sure grip.
Reduces Reload time at Lockers by -20 %.

powerAddons.name: Wooden Fox
powerAddons.description:
Roughly carved, this fox statuette is no more than a few inches.A reminder that stealth and cunning is as effective as raw power.
Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 30 seconds when Reloading.

powerAddons.name: Infantry Belt
powerAddons.description:
A sturdy utility belt pillaged from a soldier.Its multiple leather loops and holsters are useful to transport tools.
Start the Trial with 2 additional Hatchets.
Grants the ability to carry 2 additional Hatchets.

powerAddons.name: Glowing Concoction
powerAddons.description:
An otherworldly concoction that faintly glows a foreboding light.
Survivors hit by Hatchets have their Aura revealed to you for 5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Begrimed Head
powerAddons.description:
This Hatchet head is stained with a foul substance that afflicts anyone who it touches with debilities.
Survivors hit with Hunting Hatchets suffer from the Mangled and Haemorrhage Status Effects until healed.
Begrimed Head does not stack.

powerAddons.name: Soldier's Puttee
powerAddons.description:
A wrap taken from a dead soldier.It provides protection and support to the ankle and lower leg.
Increases the Movement speed of The Huntress to 4.6 m/s whenever she is out of Hatchets.

powerAddons.name: Iridescent Head
powerAddons.description:
A glass-like Hatchet head moulded from The Fog itself.The blade is warm and reverberating with The Entity's power.
Survivors hit by Hatchets are automatically put into the Dying State.
You can only carry a maximum of 1 Hatchet.
Iridescent Head trumps all other Add-ons.
"The iridescent glass cuts through flesh and soul."

powerAddons.name: Vegetable Oil
powerAddons.description:
A rancid oil used as a poor quality lubricant.
Reduces the Cool-down time of Bubba's Chainsaw by -0.3 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Spark Plug
powerAddons.description:
A clean spark plug fitted for a Chainsaw.
Reduces the Token Recharge time by -0.5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Speed Limiter
powerAddons.description:
A mechanical device that limits the amount of fuel small engines can intake at one time, forcing a constant and safe speed.
Grants 100 % Bonus Bloodpoints for Chainsaw Hit Score Events in the Deviousness Category.
Hits with either Bubba's Chainsaw or the Chainsaw do not automatically trigger the Dying State.

powerAddons.name: Chainsaw File
powerAddons.description:
A file whose purpose is to hone Chainsaw chains.
Reduces the duration of the Tantrum by -0.5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Long Guide Bar
powerAddons.description:
A sturdy iron replacement bar for long chains.
Increases the Revving threshold before triggering a Tantrum by +2 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Primer Bulb
powerAddons.description:
Pumps more gas in the ignition system to ensure a quick and powerful start.
Reduces the Token Recharge time by -1 second.

powerAddons.name: Knife Scratches
powerAddons.description:
Scratches cover the Chainsaw's body, caused by a searing blade.Memories of reprimands fill its holder with the fear of failure.
Increases the Movement speed during a Chainsaw Dash by +2 %.
Increases the Charge time of Bubba's Chainsaw by +12 %.

powerAddons.name: Homemade Muffler
powerAddons.description:
A makeshift exhaust system made of black gas pipes.
Reduces the duration of the Tantrum by -1 second.

powerAddons.name: Chilli
powerAddons.description:
A big bowl of steaming Chilli to keep you fresh and strong.
Increases the duration of the Chainsaw Dash and Chainsaw Dash Window by  +0.25 seconds.
"I got some good barbecue here!" — Drayton Sawyer

powerAddons.name: The Grease
powerAddons.description:
A thick yellowish ooze, concocted by the Sawyers.Used for all-purpose lubrication around their house.
Increases the Revving threshold before triggering a Tantrum by +3 seconds.

powerAddons.name: The Beast's Marks
powerAddons.description:
Jagged marks cover the Chainsaw's body, punishment from the dark beast that lives in The Fog.Memories of violent reprimands fill its holder with the fear of failure.
Increases the Movement speed during a Chainsaw Dash by +3 %.
Increases the Charge time of Bubba's Chainsaw by +12 %.

powerAddons.name: Shop Lubricant
powerAddons.description:
An oil specifically formulated for Chainsaws.A special additive prevents oil throw off.
Downing a Survivor with Bubba's Chainsaw while no other Survivors are in the Terror Radius will cloak that Survivor's Aura from other Survivors for 20 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Grisly Chains
powerAddons.description:
A chain with unusually hefty cutter teeth that leaves victims crippled even after being healed.
Survivors suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed when hit with Bubba's Chainsaw.
Grisly Chains does not stack with other instances of the Mangled Status Effect.

powerAddons.name: Begrimed Chains
powerAddons.description:
This chain is stained with a foul substance that debilitates anyone it touches.
Survivors drop their Items when hit with Bubba's Chainsaw.

powerAddons.name: Rusted Chains
powerAddons.description:
This chain is covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that make injuries particularly difficult to heal.
Survivors injured with Bubba's Chainsaw suffer from the Broken Status Effect for 90 seconds.
Rusted Chains does not stack with other instances of the Broken Status Effect.

powerAddons.name: Light Chassis
powerAddons.description:
A light and durable Chainsaw chassis with a shorter guide bar.Makes the Chainsaw easier to handle.
While revving the Chainsaw, see the Auras of all Survivors within 8 metres.

powerAddons.name: Depth Gauge Rake
powerAddons.description:
Tool that increases the angle of the depth gauge, making the chain eat more "wood".
Increases the available Tokens by 1 Token.
Reduces the Charge speed of the Chainsaw Sweep by -18 %.
Reduces the Chainsaw Dash Movement speed by -2 %.

powerAddons.name: Award-winning Chilli
powerAddons.description:
A big bowl of spicy Chilli made famous thanks to prime meat.
Increases the duration of the Chainsaw Dash and Chainsaw Dash Window by  +0.5 seconds.
"The secret's in the meat" — Drayton Sawyer

powerAddons.name: Iridescent Flesh
powerAddons.description:
A thin slice of smooth, young flesh.The veins shimmer with luminescent glow, as if life still flows within.
Replenishes all Tokens when hitting a Survivor with Bubba's Chainsaw.
Limits the maximum duration of the Tantrum to 5 seconds.
"There are moments when we cannot believe that what is happening is really true.Pinch yourself and you may find out that it is." — Pam Jones

powerAddons.name: Carburettor Tuning Guide
powerAddons.description:
A crudely drawn guide to properly adjust and tune a Chainsaw carburettor.
The Chainsaw Dash automatically consumes all Tokens.
Increases the duration of the Chainsaw Dash by +0.5 seconds.
Reduces the Recharge rate of the Chainsaw Sweep by -0.28 c/s.
Reduces the Chainsaw Dash Movement speed by -2 %.

powerAddons.name: Spit Polish Rag
powerAddons.description:
A grimy piece of burlap.Spit and elbow grease was enough to wipe down the Speargun in the heat of a shootout.
Reduces the Cool-down time after missed shots with The Redeemer by -0.25 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Snake Oil
powerAddons.description:
A tincture of oils and extracts purchased from a travelling salesman.Purported to cure all that ails you.
Increases the Reeling speed by +5 %.

powerAddons.name: Rickety Chain
powerAddons.description:
Weak steel links first used on Caleb's prototype Speargun.Despite the chain's failings, it holds sentimental value.
Grants 50 % bonus Bloodpoints for Speared Score Events.
Increases the rate at which Survivors break free from The Redeemer by +33 %.

powerAddons.name: Modified Ammo Belt
powerAddons.description:
An old ammo belt Caleb altered for his specialised weaponry.Still holds the fine red dirt of the Arizona Territory desert.
Reduces the Reload time by -0.25 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Rusted Spike
powerAddons.description:
A railroad spike that Caleb fastened to the front of the Speargun during a moment of morbid curiosity.The dull tip prevents it from cleanly piercing its target.
Survivors hit with The Redeemer suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.

powerAddons.name: Poison Oak Leaves
powerAddons.description:
An ordinary-looking plant, Caleb found out that spears coated in its oil cause unbearable blistering around wound.
Increases Mending time by +1.5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Marshal's Badge
powerAddons.description:
A silver badge taken from the corpse of a lawman in Arizona Territory who interfered with the Hellshire Gang's bounties.
Reduces the Terror Radius of The Deathslinger by -4 metres while Aiming Down Sights.
"Get your prayers in, you'll be swinging by noon." — Caleb Quinn

powerAddons.name: Jaw Smasher
powerAddons.description:
The bullet that ripped through Caleb's jaw during a frenzy shootout.It brings back burning desire for revenge.
Increases the Movement speed of The Deathslinger while Aiming Down Sights by +1 %.
"You called death to your door the instant you done me wrong." — Caleb Quinn

powerAddons.name: Chewing Tobacco
powerAddons.description:
A can of clipped and sweetened tobacco leaves lifted from a gutted body in Glenvale.Stimulates the nervous system.
Reduces the Stun duration when Survivors break free from The Redeemer by -0.5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Warden's Keys
powerAddons.description:
The dull jangle of the keys evokes a furious memory within Caleb.
Reduces the Reload time by -0.5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Wanted Poster
powerAddons.description:
The yellowed remains of a wanted poster for Mason Kelly.It kept Caleb focused on the hunt.
Increases the Movement speed of The Deathslinger while Aiming Down Sights by +2.5 %.
"You'll be met with a fierce reckoning, swear it on my mum's grave." — Caleb Quinn

powerAddons.name: Tin Oil Can
powerAddons.description:
A can holding a small amount of oil to reduce friction in machinery.Early models of the Speargun were notorious for jamming, and oil had to be readily available.
Reduces the Cool-down time after missed shots with The Redeemer by -0.5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Honey Locust Thorn
powerAddons.description:
Angered with a bounty who fled twice before, Caleb twisted thorn branches onto a spear and let it loose.
Survivors breaking free from The Redeemer suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.

powerAddons.name: Bayshore's Gold Tooth
powerAddons.description:
A golden tooth torn from Henry Bayshore as he screamed for mercy, hours before he was finished off.
Increases the Reeling speed by +9 %.
"Know your place, boy. Know you damn place." — Henry Bayshore

powerAddons.name: Prison Chain
powerAddons.description:
A thick, heavy chain that once held a steel ball and latched to Caleb's ankle.It has been re-purposed to hook onto a spear.
Increases the time required for Survivors to break free from The Redeemer by +10 %.
"Inmates working beyond the prison yard must be affixed with a steel ball of no less than 18 pounds." — Hellshire Penitentiary Guard Book

powerAddons.name: Gold Creek Whiskey
powerAddons.description:
Warm comfort in a bottle that quelled Caleb's anger and slowed his step.
Reduces the Terror Radius of The Deathslinger by -8 metres while Aiming Down Sights.
"A smooth taste for the rugged frontier." — Gold Creek Advertisement, 1876

powerAddons.name: Bayshore's Cigar
powerAddons.description:
A quality cigar, plucked from the jacket of Caleb's boss while he wailed over the spear lodged in his abdomen.
Reduces the Stun duration when Survivors break free from The Redeemer by -1 second.
"Do not point that thing at me, you slack-jawed imbecile." — Henry Bayshore

powerAddons.name: Barbed Wire
powerAddons.description:
Pliable American-made steel lined with sharp barbs.Despite its simplicity, Caleb found it could be wrapped around a spear to increase its viciousness.
Increases Mending time by +3.5 seconds.
"There won't be nothing to fear soon. Till then, fear me." — Caleb Quinn

powerAddons.name: Iridescent Coin
powerAddons.description:
A glass-like coin moulded from The Fog itself.A payment to the bounty hunter for the services rendered.
Survivors speared by The Redeemer from at least 12 metres away suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for as long as they remain speared.
"Deals made in desperation are paid for in madness."

powerAddons.name: Hellshire Iron
powerAddons.description:
The Hellshire Gang's branding iron.Despite folklore, it never made its mark on new initiates, instead having been used to brand particularly quarrelsome bounties.
Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for as long as a Survivor is speared by The Redeemer.
This effect lingers for an additional 10 seconds.
"Hellshire Gang: Justice Seekers or Outlaws?" — Glenvale Gazette headline

powerAddons.name: Vibrant Obituary
powerAddons.description:
Scrap newspaper, speckled with bright, eye-catching paint.It seems tragedy is a daily thing.
Increases the Killer Instinct duration of Dire Crows by +1.5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Thick Tar
powerAddons.description:
Sticky, viscous sludge that Carmina used for an experimental piece.Once it sticks to skin, it is nearly impossible to get off.
Increases the time required by Survivors to Repel a Dire Crow Swarm by +0.5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Oil Paints
powerAddons.description:
There is little left but a few globs of black and grey, yet Carmina could paint an expansive landscape with them.
Increases the Killer Instinct Detection radius of Dire Crows by +1.5 metres.

powerAddons.name: Choclo Corn
powerAddons.description:
A type of corn common in South America.A few kernels are reason enough for a crow to stop for a snack.
Increases the Idle time of Dire Crows before they disintegrate by +2 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Velvet Fabric
powerAddons.description:
A striking red fabric Carmina used on an art project.Its brightness contrasted against black feathers.
When a Survivor attempts to Repel a Dire Crow Swarm, the Swarm's Aura remains visible for another 1.5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Untitled Agony
powerAddons.description:
A canvas that was targeted with swipes and trashes of black paint following Matias' death.It radiates with heavy, crippling sorrow.
Survivors swarmed by Dire Crows suffer from the Hindered Status Effect for 1.5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Still Life Crow
powerAddons.description:
An ink drawing of a dead crow.Carmina's sadness over its death can be felt with each dark line.
Increases the Idle time of Dire Crows before they disintegrate by +4 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Festering Carrion
powerAddons.description:
A stomach-churning pile of meat and guts, yet it attracts hungry crows craving a bite.
Reduces the Cool-down time of Birds of Torment after a Dire Crow takes flight by -0.5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Automatic Drawing
powerAddons.description:
An experimental drawing Carmina made without conscious planning.Do not think — act.
Reduces the Cool-down time of Birds of Torment after a Dire Crow disintegrates from inactivity by -1.5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Thorny Nest
powerAddons.description:
A nest that remained empty near Carmina's home.There are sharp thorns embedded in it.
Survivors damaged by Dire Crows suffer from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects.

powerAddons.name: Silver Bell
powerAddons.description:
A shiny trinket that a crow took a liking to.The clinking of the bell was a distraction to everyone but Carmina.
Survivors swarmed by Dire Crows suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect.

powerAddons.name: O Grief, O Lover
powerAddons.description:
An abstract ink drawing that Carmina drew before walking to the Death Leap.
Survivors swarmed by Dire Crows suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect.

powerAddons.name: Darkest Ink
powerAddons.description:
An unnatural ink, so wretched and dark that it seems to pull in light around it.
Survivors swarmed by Dire Crows suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.
This effect persists for 15 seconds after Dire Crows are repelled from the Survivor.

powerAddons.name: Charcoal Stick
powerAddons.description:
A stick of charcoal that conceals anything it rubs over.
The Auras of flying Dire Crows are no longer visible.
The Auras of Dire Crows are visible for 0.5 seconds upon being summoned.

powerAddons.name: Severed Tongue
powerAddons.description:
Carmina's tongue, cut from her mouth shortly before her death.The sight instils rage not just in her, but in her crows.
Reduces the Slow-down duration of The Artist when Dire Crows take flight by -0.5 seconds.
"How are you going to tell poems now?" — Hooded Man

powerAddons.name: Severed Hands
powerAddons.description:
Carmina's severed hands, cut from her arms shortly before her death.The sight brings sheer fury to her and her protectors.
Any Survivor within 3 metres of a Survivor, who is being swarmed by Dire Crows, will also be swarmed.
"How are you going to paint now?" — Hooded Man

powerAddons.name: Matias' Baby Shoes
powerAddons.description:
A grieving reminder to Carmina that Matias would be with her, always watching.
The Auras of Survivors within 5 metres of an idle Dire Crow are revealed to you for 3 seconds.
"See you soon, Matias." — Carmina Mora

powerAddons.name: Ink Egg
powerAddons.description:
An unusual egg that seems to be nothing but a ball of semi-solid ink.
Increases the number of Dire Crows The Artist is able to hold by +1 Dire Crow.
Reduces the Idle time of Dire Crows before they disintegrate by +4 seconds.
"Perhaps, covered in darkness as I was, they saw me as one of their own." — Carmina Mora

powerAddons.name: Iridescent Feather
powerAddons.description:
A glass-like feather moulded from The Fog itself.Simple as it may be, it is a symbol of those who watch over Carmina.
Grants the Undetectable Status Effect whenever Birds of Torment is on Cool-down and The Artist holds no Dire Crows.
Reduces the number of Dire Crows The Artist is able to hold by -1 Dire Crow.
"They saved me when I could not save myself." — Carmina Mora

powerAddons.name: Garden of Rot
powerAddons.description:
A nude self-portrait in which Carmina depicts a rotting darkness growing outwards from within.
When a Survivor completes the Repel action, they suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 4 seconds.
"I see no salvation in the rot." — Carmina Mora

powerAddons.name: Toy Sword
powerAddons.description:
A minuscule toy sword, only a few inches long.Holding it brought out a violent enthusiasm in Victor.
Reduces the Charge time of a Pounce by -0.2 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Tiny Fingernail
powerAddons.description:
Charlotte had many ways to mourn Victor's death.As the fingernails loosened from his rotting hands, she took one in remembrance.
Reduces the Unbinding time of Victor by -0.5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Soured Milk
powerAddons.description:
A metal bottle filled with milk that has since soured.Loud as Victor could be, he quieted down when presented with his meal.
Increases the Shriek radius of Victor by +2 metres.

powerAddons.name: Cat Figurine
powerAddons.description:
A wooden figure that had caught young Victor's eye.He shrieked until his mother stole it from the market, nearly blowing their cover.
Displays the Target location of Victor's Pounce.

powerAddons.name: Madeleine's Glove
powerAddons.description:
A glove once owned by The Twins' mother.During desperate times, it was held over Victor's mouth to keep him from making a peep.
Increases the Shriek radius of Victor by +4 metres.

powerAddons.name: Ceremonial Candelabrum
powerAddons.description:
The candelabrum that Victor tipped over, causing his captors to burn.A symbol of his tenacity.
Increases the Crushing time of Victor while he is idle by +0.2 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Cat's Eye
powerAddons.description:
An eyeball that belonged to a cat eaten by the starving Deshayes family.Victor hid it from his mother, using it as a toy.
Fully charging and holding a Pounce allows Victor to roam silently.

powerAddons.name: Bloody Black Hood
powerAddons.description:
A hood from one of the men that hunted Charlotte.Soon, he became the prey.
Reduces the Cool-down time when switching to Charlotte by -0.5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Baby Teeth
powerAddons.description:
Two teeth that Victor lost long ago.They are unusually sharp.
Survivors removing Victor suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 30 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Weighty Rattle
powerAddons.description:
A shoddily carved rattle that Victor cried over until his mother stole it for him.It is entirely too heavy to be trusted to a child.
Survivors removing Victor suffer from the Broken Status Effect for 20 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Stale Biscuit
powerAddons.description:
A hard, unleavened biscuit that Madeleine stole from a town's market.It was not much, but it was better than most meals
Reduces the Cool-down time of Victor Pounce by -0.4 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Sewer Sludge
powerAddons.description:
A disgusting, sticky mixture that covered the Deshayes during an escape attempt through the city sewers.
Increases the Removing time of Victor by +2 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Rusted Needle
powerAddons.description:
A needle Madeleine used to sew up her children's tattered clothes.
Survivors removing Victor suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until healed.

powerAddons.name: Madeleine's Scarf
powerAddons.description:
A cloth Madeleine wore shortly before her death.The Twins kept it as a memento.
Increases the Movement speed of Victor by +0.3 m/s.
"...shall hereby be recorded as a service to the greater good and the extermination of evil." — Inquiry into the death of Madeleine Deshayes

powerAddons.name: Victor's Soldier
powerAddons.description:
A toy soldier Victor clung to when scared.Something about it evoked jealousy in Charlotte.
If a Survivor crushes Victor while he is idle, their Aura is revealed to Charlotte for 6 seconds.
"Kch--kch—k'ull bawd mennn..." — Victor Deshayes

powerAddons.name: Spinning Top
powerAddons.description:
A wooden top shared between The Twins, though Victor wanted it for his own.He learned he could get what he wanted if he clung tightly and screamed.
Pouncing on Survivors causes them to drop any Item they may be carrying.
"Hush... hush... it is yours then." — Charlotte Deshayes

powerAddons.name: Forest Stew
powerAddons.description:
A stew of foraged vegetables mixed with moss and bark to create a false sense of fullness.
Increases the Movement speed of Victor by +0.6 m/s.
"Eat... eat, child. You'll feel better when it's down." — Madeleine Deshayes

powerAddons.name: Drop of Perfume
powerAddons.description:
One of the few luxuries Madeleine escaped her past life with.It has a pleasant, disarming scent.
While controlling Charlotte, Survivors who are within Victor's Shriek radius suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect.
"Beware the deceit of witches, for they exploit the goodness in men's hearts." — A History of Witches and Demons (1602)

powerAddons.name: Silencing Cloth
powerAddons.description:
A coarse strip of cloth that a five-year-old Charlotte would put in her mouth.Stopped her from screaming when witch hunters were nearby.
After waking from her Dormant State, Charlotte is granted the Undetectable Status Effect for 20 seconds.
"I don't like this game anymore, Mother..." — Charlotte Deshayes

powerAddons.name: Iridescent Pendant
powerAddons.description:
A glass-like pendant moulded from The Fog itself.There is a portrait of Madeleine Deshayes upon it, though something about her depiction seems unsettling.
If a Survivor crushes Victor while he is idle, they suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 45 seconds.
"Your binding is no curse, my loves. It is your strength to draw upon." — Madeleine Deshayes

powerAddons.name: "Philly"
powerAddons.killerName: Danny Johnson alias Jed Olsen (The  Ghost Face)
powerAddons.description:
A stolen camera from a victim of Olsen in Philadelphia, where he worked before.The film inside captured his last night in the city.
Reduces the time required to Mark a Survivor by -20 %.
"Gotta love Philly: keeps giving and giving and I do not wanna forget any of it." — The Ghost Face

powerAddons.name: Walleye's Matchbook
powerAddons.killerName: Danny Johnson alias Jed Olsen (The  Ghost Face)
powerAddons.description:
A sheet of matches from Walleyes, a small bar in Northern Roseville.A victim's phone number is scribbled in blue.One of the incriminating pieces of evidence found.
Reduces the Power Recovery time by -6 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Headline Cut-Outs
powerAddons.killerName: Danny Johnson alias Jed Olsen (The  Ghost Face)
powerAddons.description:
Cut-outs of articles covering unsolved murder cases from Utah to Pennsylvania.While The Ghost Face just authored some of the headlines, he committed all of the murders.Compiling your success makes you proud and boosts your confidence.
Increases Movement speed while Stalking by +40 %.

powerAddons.name: Cheap Cologne
powerAddons.killerName: Danny Johnson alias Jed Olsen (The  Ghost Face)
powerAddons.description:
Dollar store cologne with a pungent scent of rubbing alcohol.Worn by The Ghost Face to make his presence known.Reserved for impromptu visits.
Increases the time Survivors stay Marked by +10 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Telephoto Lens
powerAddons.killerName: Danny Johnson alias Jed Olsen (The  Ghost Face)
powerAddons.description:
A manual focus lens to remain undetected while taking pictures from afar.
Whenever a Survivor reveals The Ghost Face, they suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 60 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Cinch Straps
powerAddons.killerName: Danny Johnson alias Jed Olsen (The  Ghost Face)
powerAddons.description:
Black straps that keep everything in place while on the prowl.
Night Shroud remains active after missing a Basic Attack.

powerAddons.name: Olsen's Journal
powerAddons.killerName: Danny Johnson alias Jed Olsen (The  Ghost Face)
powerAddons.description:
A spiral notebook filled with stained, handwritten entries.The journal details different equipment used to stalk victims.Going through your past methods triggers thrilling memories.
Marked Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect until the Mark expires.

powerAddons.name: Olsen's Address Book
powerAddons.killerName: Danny Johnson alias Jed Olsen (The  Ghost Face)
powerAddons.description:
Filled in blunt, blue crabbed writing.All the Roseville murder victims are listed there, along with their phone number and address.
Marked Survivors rushing an action reveal their Aura for 5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Marked Map
powerAddons.killerName: Danny Johnson alias Jed Olsen (The  Ghost Face)
powerAddons.description:
The annotated map of Northern Roseville, Florida.Each 'X' represents a victim of The Ghost Face.Mapping out your targets allows you to roam the streets undetected.
Increases Killer Instinct duration when The Ghost Face is revealed by +2 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Olsen's Wallet
powerAddons.killerName: Danny Johnson alias Jed Olsen (The  Ghost Face)
powerAddons.description:
Olsen's wallet holds thirty dollars in cash, a video club membership card, and a folded picture of Olsen's first Roseville victim.Carrying incriminating evidence boosts your excitement and resolve.
Breaking a Pallet or Breakable Wall immediately recharges Night Shroud.

powerAddons.name: Leather Knife Sheath
powerAddons.killerName: Danny Johnson alias Jed Olsen (The  Ghost Face)
powerAddons.description:
A quiet and flexible sheath to carry your blade.Movement is easier when things are fastened into place.
Increases Crouch Movement speed by +10 %.

powerAddons.name: Lasting Perfume
powerAddons.killerName: Danny Johnson alias Jed Olsen (The  Ghost Face)
powerAddons.description:
An overpowering musky fragrance worn by The Ghost Face to announce his presence.Reserved for the victims he planned to write about.
Increases the time hooked Survivors take to reveal The Ghost Face to 3 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Knife Belt Clip
powerAddons.killerName: Danny Johnson alias Jed Olsen (The  Ghost Face)
powerAddons.description:
A perfect belt clip to scout carry your blade discreetly.No one knows what you are planning to do tonight.
Reduces the Terror Radius of The Ghost Face by -8 metres while crouching.

powerAddons.name: Chewed Pen
powerAddons.killerName: Danny Johnson alias Jed Olsen (The  Ghost Face)
powerAddons.description:
A blue pen with a chewed cap that holds traces of Danny's DNA.Incriminating evidence that was never found.
Increases the time dying Survivors take to reveal The Ghost Face to 3 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Victim's Detailed Routine
powerAddons.killerName: Danny Johnson alias Jed Olsen (The  Ghost Face)
powerAddons.description:
A ripped page outlining the weekly routine of Olsen's first victim in Roseville.Compiling your victim's habits allows you to anticipate their movements.
Whenever a Survivor is Marked by The Ghost Face, they suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 5 seconds.
"I have been watching you for a while. I wanted this to be special; the kind of headlines that people do not forget." — The Ghost Face

powerAddons.name: Night Vision Monocular
powerAddons.killerName: Danny Johnson alias Jed Olsen (The  Ghost Face)
powerAddons.description:
Night vision lens enabling sharp photos even when shrouded in darkness.Ideal for discreet, impromptu visits late at night.
Whenever a Survivor reveals The Ghost Face, they suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Drop-Leg Knife Sheath
powerAddons.killerName: Danny Johnson alias Jed Olsen (The  Ghost Face)
powerAddons.description:
A sheath allowing for a full motion range:ideal to inflict quick and powerful wounds while moving freely.Stolen from a patrol officer the night Danny left Philadelphia.
Grants a 10 % Haste Status Effect for 5 seconds after Marking a Survivor.
"Gotta get ready like a scout — without the stupid patches. What I get is much better." — The Ghost Face

powerAddons.name: Driver's License
powerAddons.killerName: Danny Johnson alias Jed Olsen (The  Ghost Face)
powerAddons.description:
A driver's license revealing Olsen's true identity:Danny Johnson.
When Marking a Survivor repairing a Generator, the Generator explodes and loses -20 % of its Progression.
The affected Generator becomes blocked for the next 15 seconds.
Marking multiple Survivors on the same Generator will only apply the penalty once.
"They all want to know who Ghost Face is. But what they should ask is, who is next." — The Ghost Face

powerAddons.name: "Ghost Face Caught on Tape"
powerAddons.killerName: Danny Johnson alias Jed Olsen (The  Ghost Face)
powerAddons.description:
A tape obtained by Olsen to write an article that terrorised Roseville.
Putting a Survivor into the Dying State with a Basic Attack immediately recharges Night Shroud.
"In this footage, a dark figure is seen entering a house late at night in Northern Roseville, Florida.The police were called the next morning to report a murder in the area.Lock your doors: a Killer is in our midst, roaming freely, like a ghost in the night." — The Roseville Gazette

powerAddons.name: Outdoor Security Camera
powerAddons.killerName: Danny Johnson alias Jed Olsen (The  Ghost Face)
powerAddons.description:
A small surveillance camera that filmed The Ghost Face breaking into a house on Belleview Road in Northern Roseville.The camera was positioned at the perfect angle to catch a glimpse of The Ghost Face without providing any real clue to the police.
Putting a Marked Survivor into the Dying State reveals the Auras of all Survivors for 7 seconds.
"An image is worth a thousand words." — The Ghost Face

powerAddons.name: Leather Strip
powerAddons.description:
Leather strips torn from a Cenobite's uniform, allowing for the mutilation of exposed flesh.
Reduces Summons of Pain cool-down by -0.15 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Lively Crickets
powerAddons.description:
Insects which scarcely avoided being eaten by a mysterious drifter.
Increases Possessed Chain Turn rate by +10 %.

powerAddons.name: Burning Candle
powerAddons.description:
A candle lit by Frank Cotton during a fatal summoning ceremony.
Reduces Chain Hunt Activation time by -3 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Bent Nail
powerAddons.description:
A simple nail that cut deep into Larry Cotton's hand.Though the damage was superficial, it set into motion a horrifying set of events.
Grants 100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Chain Bound Score Event in the Deviousness Category.
Hits with Possessed Chains only spawn 1 additional Chain.

powerAddons.name: Wriggling Maggots
powerAddons.description:
Larvae that poured from the mouth of a corpse hidden in the Cotton household.
Increases Possessed Chains Turn rate by +15 %.

powerAddons.name: Spoiled Meal
powerAddons.description:
A pile of mould, feasted on by a cockroach.Perhaps a sign of Frank Cotton's mysterious disappearance...
Increases maximum Possessed Chains Travel distance by +2 metres.

powerAddons.name: Skewered Rat
powerAddons.description:
A crude solution for the Cotton home's rat problem.
Reduces Summons of Pain cool-down by -0.45 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Liquified Gore
powerAddons.description:
The result of summoning the Cenobites.There is no telling what part of the human body this belonged to.
Increases Lament Configuration Solving time by +1 second.

powerAddons.name: Flickering Television
powerAddons.description:
A television that acted strangely upon the arrival of the Cenobites.
Increases maximum Gateway Casting distance by +4 metres.

powerAddons.name: Torture Pillar
powerAddons.description:
A dangling slab covered in the gore of past victims.
Reduces Chain Hunt Activation time by -6 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Slice of Frank
powerAddons.description:
A slab of Frank's face after his torture at the hand of the Cenobites.
Survivors carrying the Lament Configuration suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect.

powerAddons.name: Larry's Remains
powerAddons.description:
The skeletal remains of Larry Cotton, covered in a thick, sticky layer of blood.
Increases Lament Configuration Solving time by +2 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Larry's Blood
powerAddons.description:
The blood of Larry Cotton, which partially resurrected his brother Frank.
Increases maximum Possessed Chains Travel distance by +4 metres.

powerAddons.name: Frank's Heart
powerAddons.description:
The beating heart of Frank, given life from his brother's blood.
Increases maximum Gateway Casting distance by +8 metres.

powerAddons.name: Original Pain
powerAddons.description:
The first pin pushed into Pinhead's skull.Such pleasure and pain.
Survivors who break free of Possessed Chains suffer from the Deep Wound Status Effect

powerAddons.name: Impaling Wire
powerAddons.description:
A wire that pierces the cheeks of a Cenobite, while revealing the gaping wound on her neck.
Summons 1 additional Chain if a Survivor uses the environment to break a Chain.

powerAddons.name: Greasy Black Lens
powerAddons.description:
A lens from the sunglasses of an obese Cenobite whose fleshy rolls droop down his face and neck.
Reveals Survivors hit by Possessed Chains for 6 seconds

powerAddons.name: Chatterer's Tooth
powerAddons.description:
A fragment from a Cenobite whose mouth chatters endlessly.This tooth, having broken from his jaw, is finally silent.
Reveals the Lament Configuration to The Cenobite.Picking up the Lament Configuration has the following effects:
Deactivates an on-going Chain Hunt.
Gain the Undetectable Status Effect for 25 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Iridescent Lament Configuration
powerAddons.description:
A glass-like puzzle box moulded from The Fog itself.This replica differs from the original, providing altogether new powers.
While a Chain Hunt is inactive, Survivors beyond 24 metres of the Lament Configuration cannot see its Aura.
"You opened it. We came." — Pinhead

powerAddons.name: Engineer's Fang
powerAddons.description:
A sharp tooth from the maw of a fleshy, scorpion-like creature, known to accompany Cenobites on their grim undertakings.
Possessed Chains injure Healthy Survivors, but do not bind them or spawn additional Chains.
Increases Gateway Closing time after hitting a healthy Survivor with a Possessed Chain by +0.25 seconds.
When hitting an injured Survivor with a Possessed Chain, only 1 additional Chain will spawn.
"We have such sights to show you." — Pinhead

powerAddons.name: Smiley Face Pin
powerAddons.description:
A friendly looking, bright yellow button used as a sarcastic statement.
Survivors who perform a Self-Mend from the Deep Wound Status Effect applied by The Legion suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Scratched Ruler
powerAddons.description:
A wooden ruler deeply scratched with hash marks.
Reduces Power Recovery time by -5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Mischief List
powerAddons.description:
A list of mischievous missions to accomplish, memento of brighter days.
Extends Feral Frenzy by +2 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Friendship Bracelet
powerAddons.description:
A wide grey and red braided rope bracelet.The inscription "F. J. S. J." can be seen, crudely written in bold black ink.
Extends the Lunge duration of Feral Slashes by +0.3 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Never-Sleep Pills
powerAddons.description:
Highly caffeinated tablets to make you extra sharp for exams or draining activities.
Reduces the base Movement speed of Feral Frenzy to 4.6 m/s.
Increases the duration of Feral Frenzy by +10 seconds.
Grants a stack-able additional +100 Bloodpoints for successful Feral Slashes, up to a maximum of +500 Bloodpoints.

powerAddons.name: Mural Sketch
powerAddons.description:
A rough sketch of The Legion mural torn from a notebook.
Increases the stack-able Movement Speed boost from successful Feral Slashes to +0.3 m/s, up to a maximum of +1.2 m/s.

powerAddons.name: Julie's Mix Tape
powerAddons.description:
A dark and depressing mix tape made out from mainly power ballads and gloomy melodies.
Refills the Power Gauge when getting stunned by any means in Feral Frenzy.
Unlocks an additional music layer in the Terror Radius and Chase Music of The Legion.
Can be combined with other Mix Tapes to unlock multiple layers.

powerAddons.name: Etched Ruler
powerAddons.description:
A wooden ruler deeply etched with the names of enemies.
Survivors hit with a Feral Slash suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 60 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Defaced Smiley Pin
powerAddons.description:
A once friendly looking, bright yellow button of a defaced smiley.A signature icon of The Legion.
Survivors who perform a Self-Mend from the Deep Wound Status Effect applied by The Legion suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.

powerAddons.name: The Legion Pin
powerAddons.description:
A handmade button with the face of The Legion.To use exclusively on intimidation dares.
Survivors who perform a Self-Mend from the Deep Wound Status Effect applied by The Legion suffer from the Broken Status Effect for 60 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Susie's Mix Tape
powerAddons.description:
A fast and thrilling mix tape with energising songs with break-neck beats.
Extends the Killer Instinct Detection radius by +20 metres.
Unlocks an additional music layer in the Terror Radius and Chase Music of The Legion.
Can be combined with other Mix Tapes to unlock multiple layers.

powerAddons.name: Stolen Sketch Book
powerAddons.description:
A sketch book with imaginative and evocative, if not slightly bizarre sketches.
From the second Feral Slash onwards, Survivors drop their Items when hit.

powerAddons.name: Stylish Sunglasses
powerAddons.description:
Oval-shaped sunglasses that exude poise and cool.Their colour-tinted lenses add an understated appeal.
Survivors Mending within 24 metres of your location have their Auras revealed to you.

powerAddons.name: Joey's Mix Tape
powerAddons.description:
A mix of bangin' tracks and slammin' beats for chillaxin' when life's a bitch.
Survivors who perform a Self-Mend from the Deep Wound Status Effect applied by The Legion suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until fully healed.
Unlocks an additional music layer in the Terror Radius and Chase Music of The Legion.
Can be combined with other Mix Tapes to unlock multiple layers.

powerAddons.name: Stab Wounds Study
powerAddons.description:
A printed medical article stolen from Ormond's public library, vulgarising a study on lesions and stab wounds.
Survivors who perform a Self-Mend from the Deep Wound Status Effect applied by The Legion have their Aura revealed for 4 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Frank's Mix Tape
powerAddons.description:
Never go on a kill mission without your tunes.A track list of massive distortions and loud percussion that stabs at your eardrums.
Increases the Action speed of damaging Generators by +20 % and breaking Breakable Walls by +30 % during Feral Frenzy.
While performing these interactions, the Power Gauge is paused.
Unlocks an additional music layer in the Terror Radius and Chase Music of The Legion.
Can be combined with other Mix Tapes to unlock multiple layers.

powerAddons.name: Filthy Blade
powerAddons.description:
This blade is stained with foul spots of blood and grime that make injuries particularly difficult to mend.
Increases Mending time by +4 seconds.

powerAddons.name: BFFs
powerAddons.description:
An unnaturally cold silver necklace split into four, one for each best friend.
Hitting Survivors with chained Feral Slashes grants Tokens.The more Feral Slashes are chained together, the higher the amount of awarded Tokens:

First Feral Slash: grants no Tokens
Second Feral Slash: +2 Tokens
Third Feral Slash: +3 Tokens
Fourth Feral Slash: +4 Tokens
Fifth Feral Slash: +5 Tokens
Once the Exit Gates are powered and only if 15 or more Tokens have been acquired, The Legion benefits from the following effect:

Grants a 4 % Haste Status Effect when not using Feral Frenzy.

powerAddons.name: Iridescent Button
powerAddons.description:
A glass-like button moulded from The Fog that captures The Legion's likeness.The surface is warm and reverberating with The Entity's power.
Feral Vaults immediately break the vaulted Pallet.
"The youth consumed by the iridescent glass magnifies and widens the reach of The Entity."

powerAddons.name: Fuming Mix Tape
powerAddons.description:
Dark beats, violent shreds and unfathomable vocals from another world fill the mind with a vibrating sixth sense.
The Repair Progression of Generators can be determined by the intensity of their Auras during Feral Frenzy.
Generators not being repaired start regressing.
Unlocks an additional music layer in the Terror Radius and Chase Music of The Legion.
Can be combined with other Mix Tapes to unlock multiple layers.

powerAddons.name: Wool Shirt
powerAddons.description:
A small boy's orange and yellow striped shirt. Identified with a sewn name tag to "Jesse".
Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effects:

Increases the Regression penalty of failed Repairing and Healing Skill Checks by +4 %.

powerAddons.name: Sheep Block
powerAddons.description:
A white and blue wooden block depicting two woolly Lambs grazing and the letter "S".
Survivors interacting with a Dream Trap suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 30 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Kid's Drawing
powerAddons.description:
An unattributed drawing clearly crafted by a young child.
Gain an extra 200 Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category when a Survivor triggers a Dream Snare.
Reduces the Movement Speed penalty of triggered Dream Snares by -10 %.

powerAddons.name: Garden Rake
powerAddons.description:
A small claw rake, a must have tool for any accomplished gardener.
Replaces Dream Snares with Dream Pallets.
Grants 7 Dream Tokens.

powerAddons.name: Prototype Claws
powerAddons.description:
A home-made tool to facilitate bush trimming.
Replaces Dream Snares with Dream Pallets.
Grants 7 Dream Tokens.
The Auras of Survivors interacting with Dream Pallets are revealed for 4 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Outdoor Rope
powerAddons.description:
Sturdy outdoor rope, handy to tie up anything.
Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effects:

Increases the audible range of Generator-Repair noises by +8 metres.

powerAddons.name: Nancy's Sketch
powerAddons.description:
A crude and bold sketch made with Fusain, signed by Nancy H.
Reduces the Cool-down duration of Dream Projection by -2 % for each Survivor inside the Dream World.

powerAddons.name: Green Dress
powerAddons.description:
A little girl's green dress with a silky white ribbon.
Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effects:

Increases the Regression penalty of failed Repairing and Healing Skill Checks by +4 %.
The Auras of Survivors failing these Skill Checks are revealed for 3 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Cat Block
powerAddons.description:
A white and purple wooden block depicting a sleeping Cat and the letter "C".
Survivors interacting with a Dream Trap suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect for 60 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Unicorn Block
powerAddons.description:
A white and red wooden block depicting a prancing Unicorn and the letter "U".
Survivors interacting with a Dream Trap suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Paint Thinner
powerAddons.description:
A tin of a highly volatile and inflammable material.
Replaces Dream Snares with Dream Pallets.
Grants 7 Dream Tokens.
The Auras of Survivors interacting with Dream Pallets are revealed for 6 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Nancy's Masterpiece
powerAddons.description:
A painting of a Character, made by Nancy Holbrook at Badham and kept as a treasure memory.
Reduces the Cool-down duration of Dream Projection by -3 % for each Survivor inside the Dream World.

powerAddons.name: Jump Rope
powerAddons.description:
A long Double-Dutch jump rope, stained with many years of use.
Increases the volume of Survivors' Grunts of Pain by +50 %, if they are the Dream World.

powerAddons.name: Blue Dress
powerAddons.description:
A little girl's pale blue dress with white lace which's front is ruined by large cuts.
Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effects:

Increases the Regression penalty of failed Repairing and Healing Skill Checks by +4 %.
The Auras of Survivors failing these Skill Checks are revealed for 4 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Pill Bottle
powerAddons.description:
An empty pill bottle which once contained a medicine called "Zoneral".
Reduces the Distance range at which awake Survivors see The Nightmare intermittently to 12 to 24 metres.
The Nightmare is invisible to awake Survivors beyond 24 metres and when he is carrying another Survivor.

powerAddons.name: Swing Chains
powerAddons.description:
Rusty, but sturdy chains used to securely attach a swing seat.
Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effects:

The Footstep noises of Survivors are 50 % louder.

powerAddons.name: Class Photo
powerAddons.description:
A large photograph taken at Badham Preschool showing the cheerful class of '94-95.
Causes every Generator to spew blood while channelling Dream Projection and suppresses the Husk.
The Nightmare is unable to cancel Dream Projection once initiated.

powerAddons.name: "Z" Block
powerAddons.description:
A deeply scratched and burnt wooden block which's only recognisable feature is the letter "Z".
Survivors interacting with a Dream Trap suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect for 90 seconds.
Healthy Survivors will leave Pools of Blood as if they were injured.

powerAddons.name: Red Paint Brush
powerAddons.description:
A large paint brush, wet with crimson paint.
Causes all Survivors to start the Trial inside the Dream World.
Survivors are unable to wake themselves up by failing Skill Checks.

powerAddons.name: Black Box
powerAddons.description:
A black cardboard box filled with photographs.
Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effects:

Recently opened Exit Gates are blocked for 15 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Mouldy Electrode
powerAddons.description:
A mouldy electrode which can nevertheless conduct a weak electrical current.
Increases the Area of Effect of Shock Therapy by +2 metres.

powerAddons.name: Maple Knight
powerAddons.description:
A white knight chess piece made of maple.This gift from an old man brings back distant memories and imbues The Doctor with devastating focus.
Reveals the Area of Effect of Shock Therapy.

powerAddons.name: "Order" - Class I
powerAddons.description:
A conventional ECT procedure, part of a patient's daily routine at the Léry's Memorial Institute.Can cause a state of mild confusion in the patient.
Reduces Cool-down duration of Static Blast by -2 seconds.
Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Order:

Broken Pallets have a chance to become replaced with Illusionary Pallets that persist until approached.
Every 20 seconds, a new Illusionary Pallet is generated at the location of a random Broken Pallet.
The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the Illusionary Pallets.

powerAddons.name: "Calm" - Class I
powerAddons.description:
An ECT procedure using a deep wavelength that soothes various mental illnesses.With Carter's Spark as its source, this procedure can cause mild anxiety in the patient.
Increases The Doctor's Terror Radius while Static Blast is ready by +4 metres.
Reduces The Doctor's Terror Radius while Static Blast is on Cool-down by -4 metres.
Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Calm:

Madness II: Survivors intermittently (10-15 seconds active; 30-45 seconds inactive) hear a distant Illusionary Terror Radius.
Madness III: Survivors constantly hear a distant Illusionary Terror Radius.

powerAddons.name: Polished Electrode
powerAddons.description:
A like-new standard electrode equipment to conduct electro-convulsive treatments.
Increases the Area of Effect of Shock Therapy by +3 metres.

powerAddons.name: "Restraint" - Class II
powerAddons.description:
An experimental ECT procedure developed within The Fog.Uses a wavelength that links the patient's and The Doctor's minds.This procedure is known to cause mild cases of hallucination in the patient.
When a Survivor's Madness increases a Tier, their Aura is revealed for 1 second.
Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Restraint:

Increases the Illusionary Doctor duration by +6 seconds.
The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the Illusionary Doctors.

powerAddons.name: "Order" - Class II
powerAddons.description:
A high stimulus ECT procedure, part of a patient's daily routine at the Léry's Memorial Institute.Can cause a state of moderate confusion in the patient.
Reduces Cool-down duration of Static Blast by -4 seconds.
Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Order:

Broken Pallets have a chance to become replaced with Illusionary Pallets that persist until approached.
Every 20 seconds, a new Illusionary Pallet is generated at the location of a random Broken Pallet.
The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the Illusionary Pallets.
"Side effects are very rare." — Léry's Memorial Institute

powerAddons.name: "Discipline" - Class II
powerAddons.description:
Project Awakening ECT procedure for disciplinary action which uses a fixed dose at high voltage.Can cause a state of moderate paranoia in the patient.
Reduces the Detonation delay of Shock Therapy by -0.1 seconds.
Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Discipline:

Madness II: During a Chase, Survivors perceive an Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were right behind them.
This effect persists for 6 seconds after the Chase ends.
Madness III: Survivors constantly perceive an Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were right behind them.
The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the Illusionary Red Stain.
"We re-educate our patients with the greatest care." — Léry's Memorial Institute

powerAddons.name: "Calm" - Class II
powerAddons.description:
A risky ECT procedure using a deep wavelength that soothes various mental illnesses.With Carter's Spark as its source, this procedure can cause moderate anxiety in the patient.
Increases The Doctor's Terror Radius while Static Blast is ready by +6 metres.
Reduces The Doctor's Terror Radius while Static Blast is on Cool-down by -6 metres.
Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Calm:

Madness II': Survivors intermittently (10-15 seconds active; 30-45 seconds inactive) hear a distant Illusionary Terror Radius.
Madness III': Survivors constantly hear a distant Illusionary Terror Radius.
"Electro-convulsive therapy is one of the safest medical procedures." — Léry's Memorial Institute

powerAddons.name: Scrapped Tape
powerAddons.description:
A compact cassette from Project Awakening containing mostly white noise.Opens The Doctor's mind to alternate treatment methods.
Changes Shock Therapy's Area of Effect into a hollow ring, placed 8 metres in front of The Doctor, with an outer radius of 4.2 metres and an inner radius of 3 metres.

powerAddons.name: Interview Tape
powerAddons.description:
A compact cassette from Project Awakening containing an unedited interview of a victim.Opens The Doctor's mind to alternate treatment methods.
Changes Shock Therapy's Area of Effect into a narrow beam 24 metres in length and 2 metres in width.

powerAddons.name: High Stimulus Electrode
powerAddons.description:
An experimental electrode that can withstand very high charges for a longer period of time.
Increases the Area of Effect of Shock Therapy by +4 metres.

powerAddons.name: "Restraint" - Class III
powerAddons.description:
An experimental ECT procedure developed within The Fog.Uses a high stimulus wavelength to link the patient's and The Doctor's minds.This procedure is known to cause serious cases of hallucinations in the patient.
When a Survivor's Madness increases a Tier, their Aura is revealed for 2 seconds.
Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Restraint:

Increases the Illusionary Doctor duration by +6 seconds.
The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the Illusionary Doctors.

powerAddons.name: "Discipline" - Class III
powerAddons.description:
Project Awakening ECT procedure for disciplinary action which uses a fixed dose at very high voltage.Can cause a state of serious paranoia in the patient.
Reduces the Detonation delay of Shock Therapy by -0.2 seconds.
Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Discipline:

Madness II: During a Chase, Survivors perceive an Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were right behind them.
This effect persists for 6 seconds after the Chase ends.
Madness III: Survivors constantly perceive an Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were right behind them.
The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the Illusionary Red Stain.
"Respect of our patients is at the core of our principles." — Léry's Memorial Institute

powerAddons.name: "Restraint" - Carter's Notes
powerAddons.description:
An experimental ECT procedure developed within The Fog, crudely annotated.Uses an unbearable stimulus wavelength to link the patient's and The Doctor's minds.This procedure is known to cause severe cases of hallucinations in the patient.
When a Survivor's Madness increases a Tier, their Aura is revealed for 3 seconds.
Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Restraint:

Increases the Illusionary Doctor duration by +6 seconds.
The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the Illusionary Doctors.
"I CAN SEE THEIR DISGUSTING ILLNESSES ." — Unsigned Notes (potentially Herman Carter)

powerAddons.name: "Order" - Carter's Notes
powerAddons.description:
An experimental version of the ECT procedure, annotated by Doctor Herman Carter himself.The long, constant stimulus leaves the patient in a state of severe confusion.
Reduces Cool-down duration of Static Blast by -6 seconds.
Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Order:

Broken Pallets have a chance to become replaced with Illusionary Pallets that persist until approached.
Every 20 seconds, a new Illusionary Pallet is generated at the location of a random Broken Pallet.
The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the Illusionary Pallets.
"The stimulus must be kept active at a convulsive level." — Herman Carter

powerAddons.name: "Discipline" - Carter's Notes
powerAddons.description:
Project Awakening ECT procedure for disciplinary action, annotated by Doctor Herman Carter himself.The intolerably high voltage leaves the patient in a severe state of paranoia.
Reduces the Detonation delay of Shock Therapy by -0.3 seconds.
Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Discipline:

Madness II: During a Chase, Survivors perceive an Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were right behind them.
This effect persists for 6 seconds after the Chase ends.
Madness III: Survivors constantly perceive an Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were right behind them.
The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the Illusionary Red Stain.
"To avoid relapse from our most tenacious subjects, use maximum levels when proceeding with disciplinary actions." — Herman Carter

powerAddons.name: "Calm" - Carter's Notes
powerAddons.description:
An experimental version of the ECT procedure annotated by Doctor Herman Carter himself.Uses a deep wavelength that soothes various mental illnesses.With Carter's Spark as its source, this procedure causes uncontrollable fear and anxiety in the patient.
Increases The Doctor's Terror Radius while Static Blast is ready by +8 metres.
Reduces The Doctor's Terror Radius while Static Blast is on Cool-down by -8 metres.
Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Calm:

Madness II: Survivors intermittently (10-15 seconds active; 30-45 seconds inactive) hear a distant Illusionary Terror Radius.
Madness III: Survivors constantly hear a distant Illusionary Terror Radius.
"Higher quality seizures trigger catatonia. At least it gives me peace for the time it lasts." — Herman Carter

powerAddons.name: Iridescent Queen
powerAddons.description:
A glass-like queen chess piece moulded from The Fog itself.It cannot be touched without receiving a considerable jolt of electricity.
Any Survivor struck by the Shock Therapy or Static Blast Attack acquires a lingering Static Charge.

The Static Charge remains with the Survivor until it is discharged.
Any time a Survivor is within 4 metres of a Survivor carrying a Static Charge, both receive a shock identical to a Shock Therapy Attack and the Static Charge is discharged immediately.
If Survivors are within 4 metres of one another when being struck by the same Shock Therapy or Static Blast Attack, they do not acquire a Static Charge.
"Once we have established an effective method of treatment, we can focus on its efficient means of delivery." — Herman Carter

powerAddons.name: Iridescent King
powerAddons.description:
A glass-like king chess piece moulded from The Fog itself.The Entity's trace reverberating within can break the most powerful minds.
Survivors with Madness suffer from all available Afflictions: Calm, Discipline, Order, and Restraint.

Survivors intermittently (10-15 seconds active; 30-45 seconds inactive) hear a distant Illusionary Terror Radius.
During a Chase, Survivors perceive an Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were directly behind them.
This effect persists for 6 seconds after the Chase ends in Madness II and is constantly active in Madness III.
Broken Pallets have a chance to become replaced with Illusionary Pallets that persist until approached.
Every 20 seconds, a new Illusionary Pallet is generated at the location of a random Broken Pallet.
Increases the Illusionary Doctor duration by +6 seconds.
The Doctor shares in his patients' Madness in order to see the various Afflictions, including the Auras of Illusionary Pallets and Doctors.
"Gazing into the iridescent glass is plunging one's self into madness."

powerAddons.name: Trick Pouch
powerAddons.description:
A pouch with a number of hidden pockets.Used by aspiring magicians and those with something to hide.
Start with 4 extra Blades.
Increases Blade Carrying capacity by 4.

powerAddons.name: Memento Blades
powerAddons.description:
Blood-rusted knives, worn from overuse.Employed during Ji-Woon's early murders, they hold a place of importance in his heart.
Grants 100 % Bonus Bloodpoints for Showstopper Score Events.
Increases each Survivor's Laceration Meter capacity by +1 Charge.

powerAddons.name: Killing Part Chords
powerAddons.description:
