A set of chords that Ji-Woon never found a song for.Still, the sound is undeniably catchy.
Slightly increases (+0.04 m/s (this value is applied to the start/end parameters of a speed curve)) Throw State Movement speed by +1 %.

powerAddons.name: Inferno Wires
powerAddons.description:
Burnt wires form the studio fire that killed four of the five NO SPIN members.Their deaths gave rise to The Trickster.
Increases Main Event duration by +25 %.

powerAddons.name: Tequila Moonrock
powerAddons.description:
A drink invented in a modest Changwon bar.Became a favourite of Ji-Woon's.
Increases Main Event duration by +50 %.

powerAddons.name: On Target Single
powerAddons.description:
An underground single produced by Ji-Woon before achieving fame.Only the biggest NO SPIN fans collected this hidden gem.
Increases Laceration Meter Decay delay by +2 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Lucky Blade
powerAddons.description:
The first throwing knife Ji-Woon ever owned.Purchased by his father, he was expected to put on a show for those frequenting the family restaurant.
Increases Main Event duration by +0.2 seconds for each Blade Hit.

powerAddons.name: Ji-Woon's Autograph
powerAddons.description:
A signature from the celebrity known as The Trickster.Sore as his wrist was after hundred of these, it was invigorating to know he was so in demand.
Increases initial Throw rate of Blades by +1 Stack.

powerAddons.name: Caged Heart Shoes
powerAddons.description:
Shoes that Ji-Woon wore during the music video for One Caged Heart.Allows for smooth, graceful movements of the point dance.
Moderately increases (+0.1 m/s (this value is applied to the start/end parameters of a speed curve)) Throw State Movement speed by +2.5 %.

powerAddons.name: Melodious Murder
powerAddons.description:
An audio file of a victim's crisp, clear shriek as a blade opened her up.Ji-Woon incorporated the sound into one of his more popular tracks.
Reduces Reload time at Lockers by -20 %.

powerAddons.name: Waiting For You Watch
powerAddons.description:
A pocket watch worn by Ji-Woon during a live performance of I'll Be Waiting For You. It is a stage prop that does not work and never will.
Increases Main Event duration by +0.3 seconds for each Blade Hit.
"Don't run awayDon't say we're throughNo way to escape thisI'll be waiting for you" — NO SPIN's "Waiting For You"

powerAddons.name: Ripper Brace
powerAddons.description:
A wrist brace worn by Ji-Woon during the filming of his music video Ripper.Though unintentional, the design stabilises the wrist better than many medical braces.
Increases Laceration Meter Decay delay by 3 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Fizz-Spin Soda
powerAddons.description:
A limited edition can of soda promoting NO SPIN.High sugar and caffeine content.
Increases initial Throw rate of Blades by +2 Stacks.

powerAddons.name: Bloody Boa
powerAddons.description:
A boa that Ji-Woon draped around a victim's slashed neck.A number of pockets are concealed within it.
Start with 8 extra Blades.
Increases Blade Carrying capacity by 8.

powerAddons.name: Trick Blades
powerAddons.description:
Specialty blades that are only seen as faulty by those who lack imagination.A young Ji-Woon dazzled spectators with the trick he performed.
Allows Blades to ricochet off the environment twice.

powerAddons.name: Edge of Revival Album
powerAddons.description:
The Trickster's debut album.The coarse and vicious tone was met with a mixed reaction from fans despite critical acclaim.
Blades shatter when hitting the environment, dealing 50 % Laceration to nearby Survivors.
"Your whisper on meWarm as can beBurning each breathTill I can't breathe" — The Trickster's "Whispers of Warmth"

powerAddons.name: Diamond Cufflinks
powerAddons.description:
Cufflinks gouged into the eyes of a sasaeng fan who made the mistake of stalking Ji-Woon.Rubbing off the blood, there is so much to be seen in the glitter.
When a Survivor's Laceration Meter is one Blade Hit away from the maximum, their Aura is revealed for 6 seconds.
"Shhh... you don't have to see your blood anymore." — Ji-Woon Hak

powerAddons.name: Cut Thru U Single
powerAddons.description:
The first single released by NO SPIN after Ji-Woon joined their ranks.Scored an all-kill on the Korean charts.
Blades pierce through Survivors.
Subsequent Survivors hit by the same Blade receive 50 % Laceration.
"Can't stop this loveThat's tearing your heartWherever you goI will cut you apart" — NO SPIN's "Cut Thru U"

powerAddons.name: Iridescent Photocard
powerAddons.description:
A glass-like photo moulded from The Fog itself.Ji Woon's eyes shimmer holographically on his grinning face.
When a Survivor's Laceration Meter is two or one Blade Hits away from the maximum, they are inflicted with the Exposed Status Effect.
"It's okay, scream my name. Let me hear everything the pain awakens..." — Ji-Woon Hak

powerAddons.name: Death Throes Compilation
powerAddons.description:
A collection of the final sounds from Ji-Woon's victims, adapted to a vinyl record.Terrifying and emotionally raw.
Exiting Main Event replenishes The Trickster's Blades.
"Please, no... don't make it hurt... I can't... I..." — Unidentified Voice

powerAddons.name: Rotting Rope
powerAddons.description:
Had the rope been stronger it would have likely held Kazan.As it was, he escaped and butchered his captors.
Increases the Aura Detection range of Blood Orbs by +2 metres.
"Though Death is focused, he has been known to blink." — Renjiro's Doctrine 14:5

powerAddons.name: Paper Lantern
powerAddons.description:
Perhaps a memento of simpler times, before rage fully enveloped him.
Increases the Movement speed of Blood Orbs while attracted to The Oni by +4 m/s.

powerAddons.name: Cracked Sakazuki
powerAddons.description:
A cup from Kazan's wedding ceremony.It never made it through the night before being damaged.
Reduces the Activation time of Blood Fury by -0.5 seconds.
Reduces the Deactivation time of Blood Fury by -0.5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Blackened Toenail
powerAddons.description:
Fell off during one of Kazan's hundred winter treks to the temple.Despite his pilgrimage, Akito's leg would never heal.
Increases The Oni's Movement speed while absorbing Blood Orbs by +0.3 m/s.
"If a father sacrifices not for his children, then who does he father?" — Renjiro's Doctrine 11:12

powerAddons.name: Polished Maedate
powerAddons.description:
A horned crest Kazan tore from his helmet after being compared to a demon.
Increases the Passive Power Charge rate by +0.1 c/s.

powerAddons.name: Ink Lion
powerAddons.description:
An ink painting that once hung in the Yamaoka Estate.Depicts the story of a lion eaten by mice.
Reduces the Activation time of Blood Fury by -0.5 seconds.
Reduces the Deactivation time of Blood Fury by -0.5 seconds.
Reduces the Duration penalty of Blood Fury when downing a Survivor by -2 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Chipped Saihai
powerAddons.description:
A baton that belonged to Renjiro.It was stolen by Kazan upon his departure.
Increases the Duration of Blood Fury by +6 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Child's Wooden Sword
powerAddons.description:
Akito's practice sword.The child had little use for it after his injury.
Increases the Aura Detection range of Blood Orbs by +3 metres.

powerAddons.name: Bloody Sash
powerAddons.description:
Blood from a boy who called Kazan "The Noble Impostor".Kazan hid evidence of the fight from his father, often revelling at the sash in secret.
Increases' The Oni's Movement speed while absorbing Blood Orbs by +0.6 m/s.

powerAddons.name: Yamaoka Sashimono
powerAddons.description:
The banner of the Yamaoka family, Kazan felt an overwhelming pride from it.
Increases the Duration of Blood Fury by +8 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Wooden Oni Mask
powerAddons.description:
A mask that a young Kazan bought to celebrate Setsubun, its repulsively fanged mouth began haunting his nightmares.
Increases the Frequency of Survivors dropping Blood Orbs by +14 %.
Survivors drop 1 additional Blood Orb when they vault, throw Pallets, exit Lockers, crouch, or fail a Skill Check.
"It is no coincidence that man is so familiar with demons." — Renjiro's Doctrine 3:8

powerAddons.name: Shattered Wakizashi
powerAddons.description:
The fragments of an ancestral blade, destroyed by Kazan in a fit of rage.
Increases the Passive Power Charge rate by +0.2 c/s.

powerAddons.name: Scalped Topknot
powerAddons.description:
The topknot of a samurai who questioned Kazan's honour.The roots cling to a thin strip of bloody skin.
Reduces the Activation time of a Demon Dash by -0.5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Kanai-Anzen Talisman
powerAddons.description:
A trinket given to Kazan at birth, its powers are meant to protect his family from harm.
Increases The Oni's Movement speed during a Demon Dash by +0.64 m/s.

powerAddons.name: Tear Soaked Tenugui
powerAddons.description:
The cloth that Kazan's mother cried into when he left on his pilgrimage to cleanse the samurai.
Reduces the Duration penalty of Blood Fury when downing a Survivor by -4 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Splintered Hull
powerAddons.description:
Fragments of a ship that carried Renjiro Yamaoka.Against all odds, the legendary samurai seemed to survive.
Increases the Frequency of Survivors dropping Blood Orbs by +33 %.
Survivors drop 1 additional Blood Orb when they vault, throw Pallets, exit Lockers, crouch, or fail a Skill Check.
"To plan subterfuge, begin with a counsel of none." — Renjiro's Doctrine 7:9

powerAddons.name: Lion Fang
powerAddons.description:
A tooth sold from an exotic vendor, it symbolises power and nobility.
Increases the Duration of Blood Fury by +10 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Akito's Crutch
powerAddons.description:
The crutch used by Kazan's son after falling from a tree.Akito's playmate and her family were punished for the boy's injury.
Increases The Oni's Movement speed during a Demon Dash by +1.0 m/s.

powerAddons.name: Renjiro's Bloody Glove
powerAddons.description:
The glove Renjiro held to his sternum following the strike dealt by his son Kazan.
Blood Orbs are visible to Survivors.
A Survivor coming into contact with a Blood Orb absorbs it, but has their Aura revealed to you for 2 seconds.
This effect stacks for each absorbed Blood Orb.
"When all else spills out, cling only to your honour." — Renjiro's Doctrine 14:12

powerAddons.name: Iridescent Family Crest
powerAddons.description:
A crest that denotes its owner as being a part of the Yamaoka family.
Missing a Demon Strike will cause all Survivors within 24 metres of your location to scream and reveal their location to you.
"Know who you are so you may shield your heart." — Renjiro's Doctrine 11:2

powerAddons.name: VHS Porn
powerAddons.killerName: Kenneth Chase alias Jeffrey Hawk (The  Clown)
powerAddons.description:
An all time classic.You will not see things quite the same again.
Afterpiece Tonic Gas Clouds are yellow.
Afterpiece Antidote Gas Clouds are purple.

powerAddons.name: Robin Feather
powerAddons.killerName: Kenneth Chase alias Jeffrey Hawk (The  Clown)
powerAddons.description:
A warm orange feather, soft to the touch.
Reduces the Cool-down time between Bottle Throws by -40 %.

powerAddons.name: Party Bottle
powerAddons.killerName: Kenneth Chase alias Jeffrey Hawk (The  Clown)
powerAddons.description:
Be the life of the party!
Hitting a Survivor directly with a Party Bottle interrupts actions as usual, and awards 100 bonus Bloodpoints.
Party Bottles emit confetti when they break, in addition to their usual Gas effect.

powerAddons.name: Fingerless Parade Gloves
powerAddons.killerName: Kenneth Chase alias Jeffrey Hawk (The  Clown)
powerAddons.description:
Part of the standard Clown apparel, the cut fingers allow for dexterous manipulations.
Increases the Throw speed of the Bottle by +25 %.
Decreases the Throw angle of the Bottle by -15 °.

powerAddons.name: Thick Cork Stopper
powerAddons.killerName: Kenneth Chase alias Jeffrey Hawk (The  Clown)
powerAddons.description:
A sturdy cork fitting the Afterpiece Tonic Bottles marvellously.
Reduces the Reload time by -0.5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Sticky Soda Bottle
powerAddons.killerName: Kenneth Chase alias Jeffrey Hawk (The  Clown)
powerAddons.description:
An empty bottle, sticky with dried sugar and blood.
Start the Trial with 1 additional Bottle.
Grants the ability to carry 1 additional Bottle.

powerAddons.name: Starling Feather
powerAddons.killerName: Kenneth Chase alias Jeffrey Hawk (The  Clown)
powerAddons.description:
A black feather with an emerald gloss, very soft to the touch.
Reduces the Cool-down time between Bottle Throws by -50 %.

powerAddons.name: Solvent Jug
powerAddons.killerName: Kenneth Chase alias Jeffrey Hawk (The  Clown)
powerAddons.description:
A chemical volatile compound that irritates the respiratory tract, but increases absorption of the Afterpiece Antidote.
Increases the Invigoration duration by +1 second.

powerAddons.name: Kerosene Can
powerAddons.killerName: Kenneth Chase alias Jeffrey Hawk (The  Clown)
powerAddons.description:
A thin and clear combustible liquid which numbs the mind when inhaled.
Intoxicated Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 30 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Sulphuric Acid Vial
powerAddons.killerName: Kenneth Chase alias Jeffrey Hawk (The  Clown)
powerAddons.description:
An odourless syrupy liquid with high corrosiveness.
Intoxicated Survivors suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.

powerAddons.name: Spirit of Hartshorn
powerAddons.killerName: Kenneth Chase alias Jeffrey Hawk (The  Clown)
powerAddons.description:
A pungent chemical compound consisting of ammonia.One whiff is enough to jolt even the most sluggish of minds.
Increases the size and spread of Afterpiece Antidote Gas Clouds by +20 %.

powerAddons.name: Smelly Inner Soles
powerAddons.killerName: Kenneth Chase alias Jeffrey Hawk (The  Clown)
powerAddons.description:
A mouldy inner sole which gives much comfort to tired feet.
Increases Movement speed while Reloading by +66 %.

powerAddons.name: Flask of Bleach
powerAddons.killerName: Kenneth Chase alias Jeffrey Hawk (The  Clown)
powerAddons.description:
A potent chemical which causes irritation, burns and lung damage.
Increases the Hindered Penalty from Intoxication by an additional 4 %.

powerAddons.name: Bottle of Chloroform
powerAddons.killerName: Kenneth Chase alias Jeffrey Hawk (The  Clown)
powerAddons.description:
A sweet-smelling organic compound with strong anaesthetic capabilities.
Increases the size and spread of Afterpiece Tonic Gas Clouds by +20 %.

powerAddons.name: Garish Make-Up Kit
powerAddons.killerName: Kenneth Chase alias Jeffrey Hawk (The  Clown)
powerAddons.description:
Some for the face and some for the Antidote.The unknown compound intensifies the Antidote's effect.
Increases the Invigoration duration by +2 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Ether 15 Vol%
powerAddons.killerName: Kenneth Chase alias Jeffrey Hawk (The  Clown)
powerAddons.description:
A highly volatile organic compound, toxic at this concentration.
Increases the Intoxication duration by +1 second.

powerAddons.name: Cigar Box
powerAddons.killerName: Kenneth Chase alias Jeffrey Hawk (The  Clown)
powerAddons.description:
A grim and incomplete collection of fingers.Fills The Clown with longing and focuses his chemical crafting abilities.
Any Invigorated Player sees the Auras of all other Players within a radius of 16 metres.

powerAddons.name: Cheap Gin Bottle
powerAddons.killerName: Kenneth Chase alias Jeffrey Hawk (The  Clown)
powerAddons.description:
The only remnant of a cheap good time and one hell of a headache.
Start the Trial with 2 additional Bottles.
Grants the ability to carry 2 additional Bottles.

powerAddons.name: Tattoo's Middle Finger
powerAddons.killerName: Kenneth Chase alias Jeffrey Hawk (The  Clown)
powerAddons.description:
The prized middle finger of a large tattooed man.Has a faint taste of machinery oil.
The Auras of both Intoxicated and Invigorated Survivors are revealed to you for 6 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Redhead's Pinkie Finger
powerAddons.killerName: Kenneth Chase alias Jeffrey Hawk (The  Clown)
powerAddons.description:
The prized pinkie finger of a redhead.Faintly fragrant.Tastes of potpourri and varnish.
Survivors hit directly with the Bottle suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for as long as they are Intoxicated.
Reduces available Bottles by -2 Bottles.

powerAddons.name: Rope Necklet
powerAddons.description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Setting speed by +15 %.

powerAddons.name: Powdered Eggshell
powerAddons.description:
Minuscule eggshell fragments shimmering with a pale golden hue.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Tripped duration by +25 %.

powerAddons.name: Dead Fly Mud
powerAddons.description:
A small lump of mud, black with the remains of flies.Devoured to increase stamina.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Teleportation range by +20 %.

powerAddons.name: Bog Water
powerAddons.description:
Murky water contained in a glass pill bottle from another time.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Trigger range by +10 %.

powerAddons.name: Pussy Willow Catkins
powerAddons.description:
A handful of small, pristine flower clusters covered in a fine greyish fur.
The Auras of Survivors tripping a Phantasm Trap are revealed to The Hag for 3 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Half Eggshell
powerAddons.description:
One half of a perfectly round hollow eggshell.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Tripped duration by +30 %.

powerAddons.name: Dragonfly Wings
powerAddons.description:
A handful of yellowish wings, dry and crisp.Devoured to increase stamina.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Teleportation range by +25 %.

powerAddons.name: Cypress Necklet
powerAddons.description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants adorned with crudely attached cypress bark and swamp moss.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Setting speed by +20 %.

powerAddons.name: Bloodied Water
powerAddons.description:
Tainted water contained in a folded water lily leaf.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Trigger range by +20 %.

powerAddons.name: Willow Wreath
powerAddons.description:
Three frail willow branches attached to form a triangular wreath.
The Auras of Survivors tripping a Phantasm Trap are revealed to The Hag for 5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Swamp Orchid Necklet
powerAddons.description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants adorned with withered orchid petals and leaves.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Setting speed by +25 %.

powerAddons.name: Dried Cicada
powerAddons.description:
A large swamp cicada covered in a fine layer of ash; crispy.Devoured to increase stamina.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Teleportation range by +30 %.

powerAddons.name: Cracked Turtle Egg
powerAddons.description:
A pale orange turtle egg, cracked and emptied of its content.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Tripped duration by +35 %.

powerAddons.name: Bloodied Mud
powerAddons.description:
A handful of mud with veins of deep crimson.The bloody layers empower the mud.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Trigger range by +30 %.

powerAddons.name: Scarred Hand
powerAddons.description:
The cut up, severed hand of the cannibal village butcher.The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
Mud Phantasms have collision with Survivors.
Grants 300 % bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.
Disables The Hag's ability to teleport to tripped Phantasm Traps.
Scarred Hand trumps all other Add-ons.
"..." — The Butcher

powerAddons.name: Rusty Shackles
powerAddons.description:
Shackles once used to hold prisoners and carcasses in the cannibal village cellar.The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
Tripped Phantasm Traps do not spawn a Mud Phantasm.
Tripped Phantasm Traps do not give any indication of having been tripped to Survivors.

powerAddons.name: Grandma's Heart
powerAddons.description:
The cold heart of the cannibal village elder.The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
Triggering a Phantasm Trap causes the following effects for its tripped duration:

Suppresses the Terror Radius of The Hag.
Increases the Fake Terror Radius of the Mud Phantasms to 16 metres.
"Bring me another slice of the girl." — Grandma

powerAddons.name: Disfigured Ear
powerAddons.description:
The cannibal village deaf boy's ear.Deformed due to several hits to the head.The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
Triggering a Phantasm Trap causes the Survivor to be deafened for 6 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Waterlogged Shoe
powerAddons.description:
A child's shoe, long lost in the bog's waters.The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
Increases the Movement speed of The Hag by +4.5 % to 4.6 m/s.
Survivors suffer from a Hindered Status Effect while inside a Phantasm Trap's Trigger range, reducing their Movement speed by -9 %.
Disables the ability of The Hag to teleport to triggered Phantasm Traps.
Waterlogged Shoe trumps all other Add-ons.

powerAddons.name: Mint Rag
powerAddons.description:
A small piece of cotton torn from the dress worn by Lisa Sherwood on the day she disappeared.The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
Grants The Hag the ability to teleport to any untripped Phantasm Trap at will.
Mint Rag applies a cool-down of 15 seconds to teleports between un-tripped Phantasm Traps.This cool-down does not extend to regular teleports to tripped Phantasm Traps.

powerAddons.name: Steel Toe Boots
powerAddons.description:
Boots with a reinforced toe that offer protection from impact.
Reduces the Cool-down time after hitting an obstacle during a Chainsaw Sprint by -12 %.

powerAddons.name: Junkyard Air Filter
powerAddons.description:
A cracked and dusty filter.It still manages to work better than the stock model.
Increases the Overheat limit of the Chainsaw by +20 Charges.

powerAddons.name: Heavy Clutch
powerAddons.description:
A well-made clutch that keeps the chain moving smoothly.
Reduces the Collision Zone width of the Chainsaw by -30 %.

powerAddons.name: Speed Limiter
powerAddons.description:
A mechanical device that limits the amount of fuel small engines can intake at one time, forcing a constant and safe speed.
Grants 100 % Bonus Bloodpoints for Chainsaw Hit Score Events in the Deviousness Category.
Hits with either Bubba's Chainsaw or the Chainsaw do not automatically trigger the Dying State.

powerAddons.name: Dad's Boots
powerAddons.description:
A pair of trusty boots, pulled from the corpse of Max Thompson Senior.
Increases the Turn speed during the Chainsaw Sprint by +28 %.

powerAddons.name: Punctured Muffler
powerAddons.description:
A roughly modified muffler that allows for extra air flow.
Increases the Cooling speed of the Chainsaw by +50 %.

powerAddons.name: Off-Brand Motor Oil
powerAddons.description:
Affordable oil that can be used to lubricate noisy chains.
Reduces the range within which Chainsaw noises can be heard by -30 %.

powerAddons.name: Death Engravings
powerAddons.description:
Engravings found on the Chainsaw body counting the amount of lives it took.Fills the user with determination.
Increases the Movement speed during a Chainsaw Sprint by +15 %.
Reduces the Heat gained from charging the Chainsaw by -14 %.
Increases the Charge time of the Chainsaw by +12 %.

powerAddons.name: Big Buckle
powerAddons.description:
A glorious, shining belt worn by many good ol' country boys.
Reduces the Terror Radius by -8 metres while overheated.

powerAddons.name: Mother's Helpers
powerAddons.description:
A small number of caffeine pills found in Evelyn Thompson's purse.Side effects include nervousness and irritability.
Reduces the Charge time of the Chainsaw by -18 % for 30 seconds after being stunned by a Pallet.
"Doctor, please, more of these!" — Evelyn Thompson

powerAddons.name: Low Kickback Chains
powerAddons.description:
A specialised chain that reduces the likelihood of kickback.
Reduces the Cool-down time after hitting an obstacle during a Chainsaw Sprint by -28 % .

powerAddons.name: Leafy Mash
powerAddons.description:
A wet mash of fragrant leaves that mask a hunter's scent when stalking prey.
Gain the Undetectable Status Effect for 15 seconds after hitting a Survivor with the Chainsaw.

powerAddons.name: Doom Engravings
powerAddons.description:
Engravings found on the Chainsaw body representing the dark beast that lives in the Fog.Fills the user with determination.
Increases the Movement speed during a Chainsaw Sprint by +20 %.
Reduces the Heat gained from charging the Chainsaw by -14 %.
Increases the Charge time of the Chainsaw by +12 %.

powerAddons.name: Black Grease
powerAddons.description:
Thick grease that can be applied beneath the eyes to reduce glare.
Increases the Charge speed of the Chainsaw by +18 % for 30 seconds after being blinded.

powerAddons.name: Tuned Carburettor
powerAddons.description:
Despite being caked in dirt and oil, this carburettor has been well adjusted.
Reduces the Charge time of the Chainsaw by -25 %.
Reduces the base Movement speed of The Hillbilly to 4.4 m/s.

powerAddons.name: Spiked Boots
powerAddons.description:
Boots with strapped-on pieces of metal which burrow into mud for more stability and control with each step.
Increases the Turn speed during the Chainsaw Sprint by +44 %.
Increases the Cool-down time after hitting an obstacle during a Chainsaw Sprint by +28 %.

powerAddons.name: Pighouse Gloves
powerAddons.description:
Rancid smelling gloves, soiled with unknown substances.Despite everything wrong with them, they do have thick fabric.
Increases your Action speed when damaging Generators and breaking Pallets or Breakable Walls by +20 % while overheated.
Reduces the Pallet Stun duration by -50 %.
"Ain't no mess can stain a hard-workin' man's soul." — Max Thompson Sr.

powerAddons.name: LoPro Chains
powerAddons.description:
Light chains that decrease the weight of the Chainsaw, allowing for greater manoeuvrability.
Allows you to continue the Chainsaw Sprint after breaking a Pallet or Breakable Wall with the Chainsaw.
Survivors hit with the Chainsaw within 5 seconds of breaking a Pallet or a Breakable Wall are only damaged for a single Health State.

powerAddons.name: Apex Muffler
powerAddons.description:
A masterfully crafted chainsaw muffler that outperforms all others.
Silences the Chainsaw for all Survivors outside of the Terror Radius.

powerAddons.name: Iridescent Brick
powerAddons.description:
Once representative of Max Junior's confinement, this was the first brick to fall when his room's barricade came crashing down.
Gain the Undetectable Status Effect until you stop sprinting after maintaining a Chainsaw Sprint for 2 seconds.
"What kinda ruckus you stirrin', boy?" — Max Thompson Sr.

powerAddons.name: Tacky Earrings
powerAddons.description:
A very cheap piece of jewellery made from plastic. Painted to resemble precious material.
Increases the Movement speed of The Shape while Stalking by +10 %.

powerAddons.name: Memorial Flower
powerAddons.description:
A partially faded and dried pink larkspur picked up from a gravestone.
Increases the Stalk rate by +11 %.

powerAddons.name: Boyfriend's Memo
powerAddons.description:
A "romantic", if slightly sleazy, note left around to draw the attention of a female lover.
Increases the range of The Shape's Lunge Attack by +50 % (open time: +0.1 seconds) while in Evil Within I.
"The note is signed: D."

powerAddons.name: Blond Hair
powerAddons.description:
A single slightly wavy blond hair.
Increases the duration of Evil Within III by +10 seconds.
Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by +50 % (+2.5 Stalk points).

powerAddons.name: Reflective Fragment
powerAddons.description:
A tiny piece of a highly reflective material most probably from a broken mirror.
The Auras of Survivors, who have been stalked for at least 1 second while in Evil Within II, are revealed for 2 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Jewellery
powerAddons.description:
A large necklace made of beads an inexpensive metals.One of Judith's favourites.
Increases the Movement speed of The Shape while Stalking by +20 %.

powerAddons.name: Hair Brush
powerAddons.description:
A nylon bristle brush used to add body and softness to hair.
Increases the duration of Evil Within III by +20 seconds.
Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by +50 % (+2.5 Stalk points).

powerAddons.name: Glass Fragment
powerAddons.description:
A tiny piece of tinted glass, probably from a broken object.It is impossible to determine its origin.
The Auras of Survivors, who have been stalked for at least 1 second while in Evil Within I, are revealed for 3 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Dead Rabbit
powerAddons.description:
A grey rabbit which has been opened from neck to tail.
Reduces The Shape's Terror Radius by -25 % while in Evil Within II.
Increases The Shape's Terror Radius by +25 % while in Evil Within III.

powerAddons.name: Mirror Shard
powerAddons.description:
A large and sharp piece of a broken mirror.
The Auras of Survivors, who have been stalked for at least 1 second while in Evil Within II, are revealed for 5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Judith's Journal
powerAddons.description:
A journal identified as owned by Judith M. Myers.Most of the pages are defaced with frightening and disturbing drawings.
Increases the Stalk rate on the Obsession by +40 %.

powerAddons.name: Jewellery Box
powerAddons.description:
A barren wooden box in which vanity items were once stored.
Increases the Movement speed of The Shape while Stalking by +30 %.

powerAddons.name: J. Myers Memorial
powerAddons.description:
A glossy page ripped from the 1965 Haddonfield High School yearbook, one dedicated to the memory of Judith Myers.
Increases the Stalk rate by +25 %.

powerAddons.name: Hair Bow
powerAddons.description:
A blue tartan ribbon used to tie hair.
Increases the duration of Evil Within III by +30 seconds.
Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by +50 % (+2.5 Stalk points).

powerAddons.name: Vanity Mirror
powerAddons.description:
A standing portable vanity mirror in perfect condition except for a fine layer of dust and face powder covering it.
Stalking reveals the Auras of all Survivors within 16 metres of your location.
The Shape is unable to progress past Evil Within II.
Each Hit Score Event grants 150 % bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category in addition to the regular Bloodpoints gained in the Brutality Category.

powerAddons.name: Tombstone Piece
powerAddons.description:
A fist-sized granite piece taken from a broken tombstone.
Grants the ability to kill healthy or injured Survivors while in Evil Within III.
Killing a Survivor drains the power of Evil Within III, resetting it to Evil Within II.
Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by +150 % (+7.5 Stalk points).

powerAddons.name: Scratched Mirror
powerAddons.description:
A standing portable vanity mirror which has been violently scratched with a sharp metallic object.
Stalking reveals the Auras of all Survivors within 32 metres of your location.
The Shape is unable to progress past Evil Within I.
Each Hit Score Event grants 200 % bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category in addition to the regular Bloodpoints gained in the Brutality Category.

powerAddons.name: Lock of Hair
powerAddons.description:
A cut lock of blond hair bunched with a black elastic.
Increases the duration of Evil Within III by +40 seconds.
Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by +100 % (+5 Stalk points).

powerAddons.name: Judith's Tombstone
powerAddons.description:
A large and heavy granite tombstone stolen from Mt. Sinclair cemetery, belonging to Judith Myers.
Grants the ability to kill healthy or injured Survivors while in Evil Within III.
Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by +200 % (+10 Stalk points).
Reduces the Movement speed of The Shape by -9 % while in Evil Within III.
"Here lies our beloved daughter."

powerAddons.name: Fragrant Tuft of Hair
powerAddons.description:
A tuft of blond hair which was forcefully torn off someone's scalp.Releases hints of feminine floral fragrance.
Grants unlimited duration to Evil Within III.
Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by +200 % (+10 Stalk points).

powerAddons.name: Visitor Wristband
powerAddons.description:
An electronic Umbrella wristband for visitors to the facility.It also doubles as a tracking device.
Increases the Survivor Detection range of Zombies by +2 metres.
Increases the Field of View of Zombies by +10 °.

powerAddons.name: S.T.A.R.S. Field Combat Manual
powerAddons.description:
A manual of compiled S.T.A.R.S. close-range combat knowledge, edited by Chris Redfield.
After Zombies hit a Survivor, their Aura turns yellow for 6 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Damaged Syringe
powerAddons.description:
Medical equipment that fared poorly during the chaos that overwhelmed Raccoon City.
Increases Vaccine Injection time for Survivors by +2 seconds.
Increases Killer Instinct duration after a Survivors uses a Vaccine by +1.5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Brian's Intestine
powerAddons.description:
The small intestine of Brian Irons, chief of the RPD.It is an appetising sight for zombies.
Increases Zombie Movement speed by +0.25 m/s.

powerAddons.name: Zombie Heart
powerAddons.description:
The heart of an eviscerated zombie.It is considered hazardous waste as it is certainly teeming with viruses.
Increases Mutation Rate when destroying Zombies with a Tentacle Strike by +0.5 Contamination Points.
"Words won't work on this thing." — Leon Scott Kennedy

powerAddons.name: Mikhail's Eye
powerAddons.description:
While little was left of Mikhail, his left eyeball survived the blast that killed him.It remains a tasty treat for zombies.
Increases Zombie Movement speed by +0.35 m/s.

powerAddons.name: Marvin's Blood
powerAddons.description:
The contaminated blood of a Raccoon City Police Officer.
Increases Mutation Rate when hitting Survivors with a Tentacle Strike by +0.75 Mutation Points.
"All you need to know is that this place will eat you alive if you’re not careful." — Marvin Branagh

powerAddons.name: Adrenaline Injector
powerAddons.description:
A hormone that heightens senses and prepares the body to fight.
Increases Killer Instinct duration after a Survivors uses a Vaccine by +3 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Admin Wristband
powerAddons.description:
An electronic Umbrella wristband for administrators of the facility.While allowing access to secure areas, it also doubles as a tracking device.
Increases the Survivor Detection range of Zombies by +4 metres.
Increases the Field of View of Zombies by +17.5 °.

powerAddons.name: Tyrant Gore
powerAddons.description:
A damaged sample from a T-002 Tyrant that died in combat.There are signs of severe burns.
Increases Mutation Rate when destroying Zombies with a Tentacle Strike by +0.5 Contamination Points.
Reduces Zombie Respawn time by -5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: T-Virus Sample
powerAddons.description:
A sample of the T-Virus developed by Umbrella Corporation, it causes extreme mutations and brain damage in its subjects.
Increases Mutation Rate when destroying Zombies with a Tentacle Strike by +1 Contamination Point.

powerAddons.name: Serotonin Injector
powerAddons.description:
A hormone that slightly relaxes the user for when stealth is required.
Gain the Undetectable Status Effect for 15 seconds, when a Zombie is destroyed.

powerAddons.name: Plant 43 Vines
powerAddons.description:
The tangled remnants of a plant infected with the T-Virus, it killed one of the researchers who developed it.
Increases Supply Case Opening time for Survivors by +4 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Licker Tongue
powerAddons.description:
A sticky prehensile tongue that easily wraps around anything it touches.
Increases Hindered Status Effect duration after becoming Contaminated by +0.2 seconds.
It's like... a nightmare." — Claire Redfield

powerAddons.name: NE-a Parasite
powerAddons.description:
A parasite used in the development of Nemesis T-Types, it is capable of hijacking its host's brain.
When becoming Contaminated, Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 60 seconds or until they cure themselves with a Vaccine.

powerAddons.name: Jill's Sandwich
powerAddons.description:
It is tragically squished and dripping with blood from a recent battle.Despite that, it has a delicious aroma that cannot be missed.
After a Survivor unlocks a Supply Case, their Aura is revealed to The Nemesis for 12 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Depleted Ink Ribbon
powerAddons.description:
Who will save them now? There is something about this ink ribbon being dry that energises zombies.
Reduces Zombie Respawn time by -5 seconds.
Increases Zombie Movement speed by +0.5 m/s.
Once all 5 Generators are completed, any destroyed Zombies respawn in an Exit Gate area.
"Look, just so you know... this is the last fucking time." — Jill Valentine

powerAddons.name: Broken Recovery Coin
powerAddons.description:
A coin depicting a bird framed by a laurel wreath.It is broken in half.
Removes 1 Supply Case from the Trial.
"This is not how I imagined my first day." — Leon Scott Kennedy

powerAddons.name: Shattered S.T.A.R.S. Badge
powerAddons.description:
A symbol of hope for Raccoon City, utterly destroyed.
Increases Zombie Movement speed by +1.5 m/s for 60 seconds whenever a Generator is completed.
"S.T.A.R.S..." — Nemesis'

powerAddons.name: Iridescent Umbrella Badge
powerAddons.description:
A glass-like badge moulded from The Fog itself.It represents a corporation that pushed far beyond ethical and humane science.
After using a Vaccine, Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 60 seconds.
"Commitment, honesty, integrity. These are the core values that create the foundation of Umbrella Corp." — Dr Matt Gorkis'

powerAddons.name: "The Serpent" - Soot
powerAddons.description:
The Laokeye symbol, representing cunning, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the Bell.
Breaking Pallets or Damaging Generators cause The Wraith to fully uncloak.

powerAddons.name: "The Hound" - Soot
powerAddons.description:
The Wonnug symbol, representing a peerless tracker, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the Bell.
Pools of Blood appear bright red to The Wraith while cloaked.

powerAddons.name: "The Ghost" - Soot
powerAddons.description:
The Khugwemuu symbol, representing the spirit world, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the Bell.
Continues to suppress the Terror Radius and the Red Stain of The Wraith for 6 seconds after uncloaking.

powerAddons.name: "The Beast" - Soot
powerAddons.description:
The Kunwulju symbol, representing the Realm of Fear, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the Bell.
The Terror Radius of The Wraith is no longer suppressed while cloaked.
Grants 100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Stalking and Surprise Attack Score Events.

powerAddons.name: Bone Clapper
powerAddons.description:
A Bell clapper made from a highly polished piece of bone.Causes the sounds of the Wailing Bell to echo and warp chaotically.
Survivors are unable to discern distance and direction of the Wailing Bell's tolls.

powerAddons.name: "Blink" - Mud
powerAddons.description:
The Kratin symbol, representing quick passing, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
Reduces Cloaking time by -40 %.

powerAddons.name: "Windstorm" - Mud
powerAddons.description:
The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
Increases Cloaked Movement Speed by +5 %.

powerAddons.name: "Swift Hunt" - Mud
powerAddons.description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing a rapid descent on a prey, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
Reduces Uncloaking time by -8 %.

powerAddons.name: "Blind Warrior" - Mud
powerAddons.description:
The Baikra-Kaeug symbol, representing ferocity, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
Survivors hit with a Surprise Attack suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.

powerAddons.name: "Windstorm" - White
powerAddons.description:
The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
Increases Cloaked Movement Speed by +7 %.

powerAddons.name: "Swift Hunt" - White
powerAddons.description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing a rapid descent on a prey, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
Reduces Uncloaking time by -10 %.

powerAddons.name: "Shadow Dance" - White
powerAddons.description:
The Yiwarick symbol, representing dark synergy, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
Increases the Action speeds for breaking Breakable Walls and Pallets, damaging Generators, and vaulting Windows by +40 % while cloaked.

powerAddons.name: "Blink" - White
powerAddons.description:
The Kratin symbol, representing quick passing, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
Reduces Cloaking time by -60 %.

powerAddons.name: "Blind Warrior" - White
powerAddons.description:
The Baikra-Kaeug symbol, representing ferocity, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
Survivors hit with a Surprise Attack suffer from the Mangled and Haemorrhage Status Effects until fully healed.

powerAddons.name: "Windstorm" - Blood
powerAddons.description:
The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is stamped in blood on the body of the Bell.
Increases Cloaked Movement Speed by +9 %.

powerAddons.name: "Swift Hunt" - Blood
powerAddons.description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing a rapid descent on a prey, is stamped in blood on the body of the Bell.
Reduces Uncloaking time by -12 %.

powerAddons.name: "Shadow Dance" - Blood
powerAddons.description:
The Yiwarick symbol, representing dark synergy, is stamped in blood on the body of the Bell.
Increases the Action speeds for breaking Breakable Walls and Pallets, damaging Generators, and vaulting Windows by +60 % while cloaked.

powerAddons.name: "All Seeing" - Blood
powerAddons.description:
The Kra-Frabai symbol, representing the Entity watching over us, is stamped in blood on the head of the Bell.
Unlocks hidden potential in The Wraith's Aura-reading ability:

When cloaked, the Auras of Survivors are revealed to you within 8 metres of your location.

powerAddons.name: Coxcombed Clapper
powerAddons.description:
A simple coxcomb knotted rope wrapped around the bell clapper to muffle its sound.A malevolent Aura emanates from it.
Silences the Wailing Bell tolls.

powerAddons.name: "All Seeing" - Spirit
powerAddons.description:
The Kra-Frabai symbol, representing the Entity watching over us, ominously glows on the head of the Bell.
Unlocks hidden potential in The Wraith's Aura-reading ability:

When cloaked, the intensity of the Aura of Generators reveal their Repair progression.

powerAddons.name: Lead Ring
powerAddons.description:
Found in a refrigerator. It's engraved with a disgusting, bloated face.
Increases the duration Rites of Judgement trails remain in the environment by +10 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Dead Butterfly
powerAddons.description:
A butterfly found on a bed at Wood Side Apartments. It's frail and nearly falls apart when touched.
Reduces Rites of Judgement Recharge time by -2 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Copper Ring
powerAddons.description:
Found in the basement of Brookhaven Hospital. It's engraved with a picture of a spider.
Increases Rites of Judgement Power duration by +1 second.
"I was locked up inside the basement's basement. It was so small and dark, and I was so afraid. I dropped my precious ring. But I'll never ever go back there."

powerAddons.name: Black Strap
powerAddons.description:
A nylon strap that was used to restrain a victim to a metal frame. The colour makes it difficult to see the blood-soaked into it.
Increases Punishment of the Damned Attack range by +0.5 metres.

powerAddons.name: Wax Doll
powerAddons.description:
A doll carved from wax, handcrafted by a prisoner who would soon face their judgement.
Increases Punishment of the Damned Attack range by +1 metre.

powerAddons.name: Spearhead
powerAddons.description:
The sharp, rusted tip of a spear. It's flaked with blood from its last victim.
Increases Rites of Judgement Power duration by 1.5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Leopard-Print Fabric
powerAddons.description:
A shred of pink, leopard-print fabric. It's difficult to tell what it was used for.
Increases Killer Instinct duration when triggered by Rites of Judgement by +0.5 seconds.
"It doesn't matter who I am. I'm here for you, James." — Maria

powerAddons.name: Forgotten Videotape
powerAddons.description:
A videotape of two lovers vacationing in Silent Hill. Despite its sentimental value, it was left behind in the Lakeview Hotel.
Reduces Rites of Judgement Recharge time by -3 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Cinderella Music Box
powerAddons.description:
A music box with a figure from the fairy tale Cinderella, found inside a suitcase adorned with stickers from multiple destinations.
Increases the duration Rites of Judgement trails remain in the environment by +15 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Valtiel Sect Photograph
powerAddons.description:
A photograph of two figures in red hoods. Entitled Crimson and White Banquet for the Gods.
Reduces Rites of Judgement Recharge time by -4 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Tablet of the Oppressor
powerAddons.description:
A metal tablet engraved with Aztec figures.
Increases Rites of Judgement Power duration by +2 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Misty Day, Remains of Judgement
powerAddons.description:
A painting of an imposing figure wearing a steel pyramid atop his head. Victims are caged in the background.
Increases Killer Instinct duration when triggered by Rites of Judgement by +1 second.
"It's him..."

powerAddons.name: Mannequin Foot
powerAddons.description:
The smooth grey foot of a mannequin, brutally torn from its leg.
Increases the duration Rites of Judgement trails remain in the environment by +20 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Burning Man Painting
powerAddons.description:
A diagram of the Lakeview Hotel. Red flames are painted over this place of guilt.
Increases Punishment of the Damned Attack range by +1.5 metres.

powerAddons.name: Scarlet Egg
powerAddons.description:
A fresh egg, strikingly red in colour, about the size of a quail's egg.
Increases Killer Instinct duration when triggered by Rites of Judgement by +1.5 seconds.
"I've never been so scared in my whole life! You couldn't care less about me... could you?" — Maria

powerAddons.name: Rust-Coloured Egg
powerAddons.description:
An old-looking egg, coloured reddish orange, about the size of a quail's egg.
Survivors affected by Rites of Judgement suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.
"James... you made me happy." — Mary

powerAddons.name: Lost Memories Book
powerAddons.description:
A book about the history and legends of Silent Hill and the surrounding area.
Survivors affected by Rites of Judgement suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 15 seconds.
"They called this place 'The Place of the Silent Spirits'."

powerAddons.name: Crimson Ceremony Book
powerAddons.description:
A book about an ancient god. Author unknown.
Injured Survivors affected by Torment suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect.
"Speak! I am the Crimson One! The lies and the mist are not they, but I!"

powerAddons.name: Obsidian Goblet
powerAddons.description:
An ancient looking goblet carved from pure obsidian.
The Executioner gains the Undetectable Status Effect when standing on a Rites of Judgement trail.
"Forgive me for waking you. But without you, I just can't go on." — James Sunderland

powerAddons.name: Iridescent Seal of Metatron
powerAddons.description:
A talisman with an odd design inscribed on it.The Entity's influence seems to have altered it.
When sending a Survivor to a Cage of Atonement, the Auras of all other Survivors suffering from Torment are revealed for 6 seconds.
"This magic square, with strong protective and dispelling properties, is called the 'Virun VII Crest' or the 'Seal of Metatron'."

powerAddons.name: Zōri
powerAddons.description:
A comfortable pair of flat sandals that can easily be slipped on and off.
Increases the Movement speed during the Phase-Walk by +5 %.

powerAddons.name: Shiawase Amulet
powerAddons.description:
A Talisman that makes one happy and enthusiastic.
Extends the maximum Duration of the Phase-Walk by +0.5 seconds.
Increases the Recovery rate of Yamaoka's Haunting by +10 % (0.03 c/s).

powerAddons.name: Origami Crane
powerAddons.description:
One of the one thousand Orizuru for your wish to come true.
Increases the Recovery rate of Yamaoka's Haunting by +10 % (0.03 c/s).

powerAddons.name: Gifted Bamboo Comb
powerAddons.description:
A narrow tooth bamboo comb to gently untangle dishevelled hair.
Increases the Activation Charge rate of Yamaoka's Haunting by +15 %.

powerAddons.name: White Hair Ribbon
powerAddons.description:
A silken bow to tame wild hair.
Increases the Activation Charge rate of the Phase-Walk by +20 %.

powerAddons.name: Rin's Broken Watch
powerAddons.description:
A wristwatch with a shattered glass.The name "Rin" is scribbled on the wristband.
Increases the Power Recovery rate by +15 % (0.05 c/s).

powerAddons.name: Muddy Sports Day Cap
powerAddons.description:
A muddy sport cap with a High School logo.Identified with a sewn name tag to "Rin".
Increases the Movement speed during the Phase-Walk by +10 %.

powerAddons.name: Kaiun Talisman
powerAddons.description:
A Talisman to get luck on your side.
Extends the maximum Duration of the Phase-Walk by +1 second.
Increases the Recovery rate of Yamaoka's Haunting by +20 % (0.0666 c/s).

powerAddons.name: Juniper Bonsai
powerAddons.description:
Dark blue-green foliage bonsai tree.Once the symbol of Yamaoka family tradition.
Reduces the Passive Phasing cool-down by -1 second.
Increases the Passive Phasing duration by +50 %.

powerAddons.name: Rusty Flute
powerAddons.description:
A rusty transverse flute with a haunting sound.
Increases the Power Recovery rate by +25 % (0.0833 c/s).

powerAddons.name: Senko Hanabi
powerAddons.description:
Thin sparklers that light up summer nights and display the beauty of ephemeral moments in life.
Ending a Phase-Walk causes the Husk to explode, blocking any Vault locations within 4 metres of its location for 5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Katana Tsuba
powerAddons.description:
The hand-guard of an ancestral blade.Crafted for the Yamaoka family.
Increases The Spirit's Reappearance duration after a Phase-Walk by +0.2 seconds.
Increases The Spirit's Reappearance Movement speed after a Phase-Walk by +5 %.

powerAddons.name: Uchiwa
powerAddons.description:
A handheld fan with a koi motif to create a nice breeze on a hot summer day.
Instantly recharges Yamaoka's Haunting when stunned by a Pallet.

powerAddons.name: Mother's Glasses
powerAddons.description:
A pair of glasses belonging to a loving mother afflicted with a chronic disease.
Survivors coming within 2 metres of the Husk during a Phase-Walk will trigger Killer Instinct.

powerAddons.name: Yakuyoke Amulet
powerAddons.description:
A powerful Talisman to protect your endeavours from being hindered by suspicious circumstances.
Increases the maximum Duration of the Phase-Walk by +3.5 seconds.
Increases the Recovery rate of Yamaoka's Haunting by +70 % (0.2333 c/s).
Decreases the Movement speed during the Phase-Walk by -15 %.

powerAddons.name: Wakizashi Saya
powerAddons.description:
The scabbard of an ancestral blade.Once crafted for the Yamaoka family.
During a Phase-Walk, press the Active Ability button to immediately return to the Husk.

powerAddons.name: Furin
powerAddons.description:
A warm summer breeze chimes the little bell hanging from the balcony ceiling.
Causes all Survivors to hear the Phase-Walk Sound cue.

powerAddons.name: Dried Cherry Blossom
powerAddons.description:
A crumbling, dried cherry flower.Once the symbol of mortality.
Coming within 4 metres of a Survivor during a Phase-Walk will trigger Killer Instinct.
Scratch Marks are no longer visible during a Phase-Walk.

powerAddons.name: Mother-Daughter Ring
powerAddons.description:
A silver ring engraved with "for my precious daughter".
Increases the Movement speed during the Phase-Walk by +40 %.
Scratch Marks are no longer visible while using Yamaoka's Haunting.

powerAddons.name: Kintsugi Teacup
powerAddons.description:
A cup mended and lacquered with powdered gold.Both the breakage and repair are part the cup.
Instantly recharges Yamaoka's Haunting after breaking a Pallet or a Breakable Wall.

powerAddons.name: Videotape Copy
powerAddons.description:
A copy of the deadly videotape imprinted upon by Sadako.It dampens the desire for vengeance.
Projection does not inflict Condemned on nearby Survivors.
Grants 100 % Bonus Bloodpoints for Deluge of Fear Score Events.

powerAddons.name: Old Newspaper
powerAddons.description:
It tells of a local woman who predicted a volcanic eruption, evidence used to initially find Sadako.
Increases the invisibility duration after Manifesting by +33 %.

powerAddons.name: Mother's Mirror
powerAddons.description:
A mirror from Sadako's mother's house.A reminder of what Sadako has lost.
Increases the duration of the intermittent visibility phase after Manifesting by +2 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Cabin Sign
powerAddons.description:
The cabin where both Tomoko and Reiko watched the tape.Carries the memory of those first curses.
Reduces the time it takes for a TV to turn on after Projection by -12 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Yoichi's Fishing Net
powerAddons.description:
The net Yoichi used while fishing with his grandfather.A reminder that death comes to us all.
Reduces the time it takes Survivors to acquire another stack of Condemned by -12 % when holding a VHS Tape.

powerAddons.name: Well Stone
powerAddons.description:
A piece of the well where Sadako was trapped, an image burned into the mind of all those who have watched the tape.
Reduces the time it takes for a TV to turn on after having been turned off by a Survivor by -6 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Sea-Soaked Cloth
powerAddons.description:
The hood worn by the mysterious figure in the tape.Makes those near it unable to trust what they see.
Survivors within 8 metres of a powered TV suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.
This effect lingers for 7 seconds after the TV is turned off.

powerAddons.name: Reiko's Watch
powerAddons.description:
The watch that Reiko left her son Yoichi.A distracting and constant reminder of one's impending doom.
Increases the invisibility duration while Demanifested by +50 %.

powerAddons.name: Clump of Hair
powerAddons.description:
Once beautiful and long, Sadako now hides behind her ragged, matted locks.
Reduces the range at which The Onryō is visible while Demanifested by -6 metres.

powerAddons.name: Well Water
powerAddons.description:
Water from the well where Sadako was left to die.Murky and black, it obscures everything around it.
Increases the duration of the Undetectable Status Effect by +2 seconds when Manifesting by any means.

powerAddons.name: Ring Drawing
powerAddons.description:
A drawing of the view from inside the well, as drawn by a young Yoichi.Helping those cursed by the tape can only bring misfortune.
Condemned Survivors spread their Condemnation to other Survivors, who complete a Healing action on them.

powerAddons.name: Rickety Pinwheel
powerAddons.description:
A pinwheel found in the caves of Izu Oshima.It spins even when there is no wind, disorienting those who see or hear it.
Survivors within 8 metres of a powered TV suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect.
This effect lingers for 7 seconds after the TV is turned off.

powerAddons.name: Mother's Comb
powerAddons.description:
The comb Sadako's mother used in the tape.Sadako's psychic abilities are enhanced when she focuses on it.
Reveals the Aura of any TV being turned off in yellow.

powerAddons.name: Bloody Fingernails
powerAddons.description:
Sadako's bloody fingernails, lost as she tried to claw her way out of the well.Evidence of her single-minded need to kill.
Increases the duration of the Post-Projection Movement Speed boost by +50 %.

powerAddons.name: VCR
powerAddons.description:
The original VCR that played Sadako's tape.It is still warm to the touch.
All TVs play the Projection effects when The Onryō Projects to a TV.

powerAddons.name: Telephone
powerAddons.description:
After watching the video, victims receive a phone call.They are frozen in fear as they realise they have seven days left to live.
Survivors witnessing a Manifestation from within 7 metres suffer from the Hindered Status Effect for 3 seconds.
"I saw a weird video the other day... after it ended, someone called us. Some kind of prank call." — Tomoko Oishi

powerAddons.name: Tape Editing Deck
powerAddons.description:
The editing deck used by Reiko and Ryuji to analyse and copy the tape.Copying and sharing the tape is the only way to survive the curse.
Each Survivor starts the Trial with a VHS Tape in their possession, and their highlighted TV is the one farthest from their location.
"Frolic in brine, goblins be thine." — Message hidden in Sadako's tape

powerAddons.name: Distorted Photo
powerAddons.description:
Those who have watched the tape find all photos of themselves distorted, a reminder of their impending doom.
Survivors witnessing a Manifestation from within 16 metres will scream, revealing their location for 4 seconds.
"Why is it only you were saved?" — Sadako Yamamura

powerAddons.name: Remote Control
powerAddons.description:
A remote for the VCR at the cabin.It allows Sadako to focus on those enemies at a distance.
After using Projection, the Auras of Survivors, who are within 16 metres of a TV and carrying a VHS Tape, are revealed to you for 7 seconds.
"She killed a man just by willing him dead. That's power of a different order from her mother." — Ryuji Takayama

powerAddons.name: Iridescent Videotape
powerAddons.description:
The original tape containing Sadako's curse.
Hitting a Survivor within 8 seconds after Manifesting turns on the last 4 TVs turned off by Projection.
"That video... It's not of this world. It's Sadako's rage." — Ryuji Takayama

powerAddons.name: Wooden Horse
powerAddons.description:
An unpainted toy carved out of cheap wood to resemble a horse.Once the symbol of a deep connection between a catatonic patient and his nurse.
Reduces the additional Fatigue duration from missed Blink Attacks by -0.5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: White Nit Comb
powerAddons.description:
A parasitic nit comb taken from the clinic.Once the symbol of a deep connection between an anxious patient and her nurse.
Grants 100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Blink Attack Score Events.
Decreases the Lunge range of Blink Attacks by -50 %.

powerAddons.name: Plaid Flannel
powerAddons.description:
A torn piece of red and black plaid flannel.The scrap of fabric imbues The Nurse with devastating focus.
Unlocks the ability to see the Target location of the Blink.

powerAddons.name: Metal Spoon
powerAddons.description:
A dull, partially rusted and stained metallic spoon.Confiscated from Room 202's patient, the "Bad Man".
Hitting a Survivor with a Blink Attack increases the volume of their Grunts of Pain by +50 % for 60 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Pocket Watch
powerAddons.description:
A charred and broken pocket watch with rattling pieces.Taken from Nurse Moris' body.
Increases the duration of the Chain Blink Window by +0.2 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Dull Bracelet
powerAddons.description:
A worthless piece of jewellery that might have an important significance to someone.Taken from the "Anxious Girl's" body.
Grants 100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Precise Blink Score Events.
Reduces the maximum range of the Blink by -4 metres.

powerAddons.name: Dark Cincture
powerAddons.description:
A black rope used as a belt in times of mourning.Taken from Father Campbell's body.
Reduces the Power Token Recharge time by -0.4 seconds per Token.

powerAddons.name: Catatonic Boy's Treasure
powerAddons.description:
A pine-cone which unexpectedly calmed a patient's repetitive movement.Taken from the "Catatonic Boy's" body.
Reduces the additional Fatigue duration from Chain Blinks by -1 second.

powerAddons.name: Bad Man Keepsake
powerAddons.description:
A rotten molar ripped from the "Bad Man's" cold dead hand.
Hitting a Survivor with a Blink Attack reveals their Aura if they are healing or being healed within 28 metres of The Nurse.
This effect lasts for 60 seconds after the Blink Attack.

powerAddons.name: Spasmodic Breath
powerAddons.description:
The twitchy and tremulous breath stolen from the "Bad Man".Aggressively pulses and jumps at The Nurse's touch.
Hitting a Survivor with a Blink Attack causes the following effects for 60 seconds:

Increases the Movement speed of The Nurse to 4.6 m/s.
Disables Spencer's Last Breath.

powerAddons.name: Heavy Panting
powerAddons.description:
The slow and bulging breath stolen from the "Fat Orderly" Kavanagh.Dimly oscillates at The Nurse's touch.
Increases the maximum range of the Blink by +4 metres.
Increases the Charge time of the Blink by +20 %.
Increases the duration of the Blink by +20 %.

powerAddons.name: Fragile Wheeze
powerAddons.description:
The whistling and rattling breath stolen from Father Campbell.Silently curves and bends at The Nurse's touch.
Reduces the Power Token Recharge time by -0.6 seconds per Token.

powerAddons.name: Ataxic Respiration
powerAddons.description:
The irregular and deteriorating breath collected from the "Catatonic Boy".Normally stable and calm, becomes incredibly agitated at The Nurse's touch.
Reduces Fatigue duration from Blinks by -0.25 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Anxious Gasp
powerAddons.description:
The gasp of surprise collected from the "Anxious Girl", which The Nurse was fond of.Twitches vigorously at The Nurse's touch.
Blinking past a Survivor causes them to scream.
Grants 200 Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.

powerAddons.name: Kavanagh's Last Breath
powerAddons.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from Crotus Prenn Asylum Orderly Harvey Kavanagh, the "Fat Orderly".In the hands of The Nurse, it wobbles with intensity.
Increases the maximum range of the Blink by +6 metres.
Increases the Charge time of the Blink by +30 %.
Increases the duration of the Blink by +30 %.

powerAddons.name: Jenner's Last Breath
powerAddons.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from Crotus Prenn Asylum Patient Mary Jenner, the "Anxious Girl".In the hands of The Nurse, it trembles with intensity.
Press the Active Ability button during the Chain Blink Window to use Jenner's Last Breath:

Immediately Blink back to the previous location.

powerAddons.name: Campbell's Last Breath
powerAddons.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from Crotus Prenn Asylum Priest Father Campbell.In the hand of The Nurse, it crackles with intensity.
Immediately Blink at half-charge in the direction The Nurse is facing after reappearing from a fully charged Blink.

powerAddons.name: "Bad Man's" Last Breath
powerAddons.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from Crotus Prenn Asylum Patient known as the "Bad Man".In the hands of The Nurse, it jolts with intensity.
Hitting a Survivor with a Blink Attack grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 16 seconds.
This effect has a cool-down of 60 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Torn Bookmark
powerAddons.description:
A white and pristine piece of ribbon once attached to a sacred book.Serves as the symbol of a dispute.
Increases available Power Tokens by +1 Token.
Increases the Power Recharge time by +50 %.

powerAddons.name: Matchbox
powerAddons.description:
A matchbox containing an odd collection of mismatched buttons.Serves as a reminder of a horrible place.
Increases the Movement speed of The Nurse to 4.2 m/s for the entire Trial.
Reduces available Power Tokens by -1 Token.

powerAddons.name: Placebo Tablet
powerAddons.description:
A pill that's utterly ineffective... or is it?
Grants 100 % Bonus Bloodpoints for Rush Score Events in the Deviousness Category.
Decreases Rush Movement speed by -15 %.

powerAddons.name: Foxglove
powerAddons.description:
A poisonous plant that sparked Talbot's interest in chemistry. It rekindles deeply buried memories.
Reduces Rush Fatigue time by -0.25 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Compound Seven
powerAddons.description:
This early sample failed to achieve desired results, but demonstrated surprising effects regardless.
Automatically face the nearest Survivor within 16 metres after a Slam.

powerAddons.name: Chipped Monocle
powerAddons.description:
A monocle Talbot rarely used despite his eyesight weakening in later years.
Displays the target location of a Slam.

powerAddons.name: Shredded Notes
powerAddons.description:
The remnants of Talbot's notes, they still contain some valuable information within.
Reduces Token Regeneration time by -0.33 seconds per Token.
Decreases available Rush Tokens by 1.

powerAddons.name: Pustula Dust
powerAddons.description:
Dried Pustula Petals ground into a fine dust.
Increases Slam duration by +0.75 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Plague Bile
powerAddons.description:
A sample of The Plague's bile, distilled and treated with a mixture of chemicals.
Increases Rush Turn rate by +10 %.

powerAddons.name: Canker Thorn
powerAddons.description:
A sizeable thorn snipped from a Visceral Canker. It secretes a mild toxin.
Reduces Rush Fatigue time by -0.5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Blighted Rat
powerAddons.description:
A rat that briefly returned to life when injected with Putrid Serum, becoming aggressive and uncontrollable.
Increases Rush Movement speed by +4 % for each consecutive Rush.

powerAddons.name: Umbra Salts
powerAddons.description:
Regular sea salt that has momentarily passed through the Spirit World, altering its properties in the process.
Increases Rush Turn rate by +15 %.

powerAddons.name: Rose Tonic
powerAddons.description:
A mixture made with dried roses from the exceedingly rare New Moon Bouquet.
Increases Slam duration by +1 second.

powerAddons.name: Compound Twenty-One
powerAddons.description:
A serum that's fatal to humans. It evokes beneficial qualities in those who are... something more.
When initiating a Slam, reveal the Aura of Survivors within 8 metres of the collision location for 3.5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Blighted Crow
powerAddons.description:
A dead crow that has been grotesquely mutated by Putrid Serum.
Increases Rush Movement speed by +6 % for each consecutive Rush.

powerAddons.name: Adrenaline Vial
powerAddons.description:
A hormone removed from an unwilling subject's adrenal gland. Though it provides a jolt of energy, it can fatigue its user.
Reduces the Token Regeneration time by -1 second per Token.
Increases the maximum Look angle during a Rush by +50 %.
Increases the available Rush Tokens by +2 Tokens.
Increases the Rush Movement speed by +10 %.
Decreases the Rush Turn rate by -0.5 °/s.
"Please, don't do this..."

powerAddons.name: Vigo's Journal
powerAddons.description:
The journal of a man who claimed to have returned from The Void. The knowledge within has practical applications.
Gain the Undetectable Status Effect while Rushing.
"In a wasteland of forgotten dreams and endless routine, the man with a way out is God." — Talbot Grimes

powerAddons.name: Summoning Stone
powerAddons.description:
Talbot used this stone to carve what he believed was his research into the Opium Den's walls.
Hitting a Survivor with a Lethal Rush will call upon The Entity to block Pallets within a radius of 16 metres of your location for 15 seconds.
"Death is only the beginning."

powerAddons.name: Soul Chemical
powerAddons.description:
A chemical squeezed from the pineal gland of a recently deceased Survivor.
During a Rush, the moment The Blight comes within 16 metres of a Survivor who is repairing or healing, trigger a tremendously difficult Skill Check for that Survivor.
Soul Chemical can activate once per Survivor per Rush.
Soul Chemical does not trigger for a Rush started within 16 metres of the Survivor.
"...suspected to cause atypical alterations in neural rhythmic activity." — Unlabelled Mystery School Text

powerAddons.name: Alchemist's Ring
powerAddons.description:
A ring given to chemists graduating from the London School of Medicine. It's a reminder of unrestrained ambition.
Hitting a Survivor with a Lethal Rush will instantly recharge all Rush Tokens.
"The student is accused of grave-robbing with the intent of unsanctioned scientific testing." — Faculty Reprimand of Talbot Grimes, 1838

powerAddons.name: Iridescent Blight Tag
powerAddons.description:
A glass-like laboratory tag, moulded from The Fog itself. Either a gift from The Entity or a cruel jest to tag The Blight as he once did to others.
Upon using all Rush Tokens, your last Lethal Rush will put Survivors into the Dying State.
"Progress requires drastic change." — Talbot Grimes

powerAddons.name: Compound Thirty-Three
powerAddons.description:
Talbot's penultimate attempt at a serum. Though it did not facilitate his escape, it did have powerful side effects.
Any Survivor within 16 metres of a Slam will suffer from the Hindered Status Effect for 3 seconds, reducing their Movement speed by -3 %.
Slamming into Pallets and Breakable Walls immediately destroys them, incurring a Cool-down of 1.5 seconds.
"Time is scarce. Let this be the one..." — Talbot Grimes

powerAddons.name: Rotten Pumpkin
powerAddons.description:
Pumpkin flesh infected by the rotten soil in Hawkins.
Traversing the Upside Down destroys the Portal entered by The Demogorgon.
Grants 200 bonus Bloodpoints for traversing the Upside Down.

powerAddons.name: Black Heart
powerAddons.description:
A black fermented heart ripped from the chest of a tentacled creature in the Upside Down.
Decreases the Attack cool-down of successful Shred Attacks by -15 %.

powerAddons.name: Rat Liver
powerAddons.description:
A soggy pile of salty, soft liver.
Increases Movement speed while charging Of the Abyss by +3.5 %.

powerAddons.name: Rat Tail
powerAddons.description:
A chewy rat tail for The Demogorgon to consume.
Increases the Opening speed of Portals by +35 %.

powerAddons.name: Sticky Lining
powerAddons.description:
A fetid, viscous layer that covers and expands the inter-dimensional tunnels.
Increases the Killer Instinct's Detection range by +2.5 metres.

powerAddons.name: Viscous Webbing
powerAddons.description:
Wet, elastic webs that broaden the inter-dimensional tunnels.
Increases the Sealing time of Portals by +16 %.

powerAddons.name: Rotten Green Tripe
powerAddons.description:
Rotten tripe that fuels The Demogorgon.
Increases the Traversing speed between Portals by +15 %.

powerAddons.name: Mews' Guts
powerAddons.description:
The tasty guts of an unfortunate victim.
Increases available Portals by +1 Portal.
Decreases the Attack Cool-down of missed Shred Attacks by -11 %.

powerAddons.name: Barb's Glasses
powerAddons.description:
A broken pair of glasses that travelled to the Upside Down.
Decreases the Pallet Break cool-down of Shred by -15 %.

powerAddons.name: Eleven's Soda
powerAddons.description:
A soda can charged with psychic energy.
Shows the Auras of Generators being repaired in yellow while traversing the Upside Down.

powerAddons.name: Thorny Vines
powerAddons.description:
Thick, thorny vines that stretch and reinforce the inter-dimensional tunnels.
Increases the Killer Instinct's Detection range by +1 metre.
Increases the time Survivors require to seal Portals by +11 %.

powerAddons.name: Brass Case Lighter
powerAddons.description:
A lighter used to ignite trouble.
Survivors under the effect of an activated Portal suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.
This effect lingers for 60 seconds.
"Emits a strong electromagnetic field: it must have come into contact with the Upside Down." — Hawkins National Laboratory

powerAddons.name: Violet Waxcap
powerAddons.description:
A dark fleshed mushroom from the Upside Down that allows The Demogorgon to telepathically distort the senses in its prey.
Increases the duration of the Undetectable Status Effect by +0.5 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Deer Lung
powerAddons.description:
A raw, rubbery lung that reinvigorates The Demogorgon.
Increases the Traversing speed between Portals by +30 %.
Reduces available Portals by -2 Portals.

powerAddons.name: Lifeguard Whistle
powerAddons.description:
A rusty, metal whistle that once ruled the Hawkins public pool.
Survivors near activated Portals are indicated by Killer Instinct without having to charge Of the Abyss.
Reduces the Killer Instinct's Detection range by -1 metre.
"Emits a strong electromagnetic field: it must have come into contact with the Upside Down." — Hawkins National Laboratory

powerAddons.name: Vermilion Webcap
powerAddons.description:
A bright red poisonous mushroom from the Upside Down.
Increases the duration of the Undetectable Status Effect by +3 seconds.
"Still experimenting with this specimen, so far our results are inconsistent." — Hawkins National Laboratory

powerAddons.name: Upside Down Resin
powerAddons.description:
A sticky, flammable sap that fortifies the gateway to the inter-dimensional tunnels.
Increases the time Survivors require to seal Portals by +40 %.
"A sample taken from the bark of the tree once used as a gate. So far our conclusion as to its effect are inconclusive." — Hawkins National Laboratory

powerAddons.name: Unknown Egg
powerAddons.description:
A large, warm egg coated in gruesome webbing.
Increases Power Recovery time by -1.5 seconds.
"A large egg was sighted in the Upside Down, but no sample survived the trip to the lab for proper examination." — Hawkins National Laboratory

powerAddons.name: Leprose Lichen
powerAddons.description:
A potent lichen that grows like dust on the rocks in the Upside Down.
Reveals the Aura of all Survivors while traversing the Upside Down and for 3 seconds after emerging from a Portal.
"One small dose can cause severe hallucinations." — Hawkins National Laboratory

powerAddons.name: Red Moss
powerAddons.description:
A psychedelic moss that grows on tree barks in the Upside Down.
Increases the duration of the Undetectable Status Effect by +8 seconds.
Suppresses all noises The Demogorgon usually makes while emerging from a Portal.
Increases the Portal Emerging time by +15 %.
"Consuming its leaf enhances athletic performance and causes euphoria." — Hawkins National Laboratory

powerAddons.name: Wooden Plank
powerAddons.description:
A wooden plank torn from the stage where Otto Stamper sacrificed a meddling journalist.
Increases the number of Charges added to the Nightfall Meter for hooking a Survivor by +25 %.

powerAddons.name: Mortar and Pestle
powerAddons.description:
Disconnected from the world and modern medicine, Stamper's followers originally had to make do with the flora local to the island.
The Dredge emerges from the Remnant facing the same direction as a Teleport is activated instead of facing the direction the Remnant was placed in.

powerAddons.name: Follower's Cowl
powerAddons.description:
They believed the cowls proved their enlightenment, but they merely kept them in darkness.
Teleporting back to the Remnant will activate Killer Instinct during Daytime as well.

powerAddons.name: Caffeine Tablets
powerAddons.description:
Stamper's followers were told not to sleep, or they would bring the wrath of Druanee upon them.Towards the end, he brought in drugs from the mainland.
The Auras of locked Lockers are visible to you in yellow while charging The Gloaming or teleporting.

powerAddons.name: Malthinker's Skull
powerAddons.description:
Those who brought negativity to the commune would mysteriously disappear from time to time.Their remains were never found... until The Dredge brought them up.
Increases the Nightfall Meter Charge rate for when Survivors are injured by +66 % per second.

powerAddons.name: Haddie's Calendar
powerAddons.description:
She planned to cross out each day until her parents took her to India, but when tragedy struck, she abandoned her calendar.
Reduces the time to exit a Locker by -1 second.

powerAddons.name: Fallen Shingle
powerAddons.description:
After the Ottomarians were subsumed by The Dredge, the mansion fell into disrepair.
Increases the Nightfall Meter Charge rate for using Reign of Darkness by +15 % per second.

powerAddons.name: Burnt Letters
powerAddons.description:
Some followers tried to write letters home.Stamper ensured that nobody would have contact with the outside world.
Increases the number of Charges added to the Nightfall Meter for injuring a Survivor by +25 %.

powerAddons.name: Air Freshener
powerAddons.description:
After her parents were found, this was in the bag of belongings the police returned.Haddie does not know why she keeps it.
Start the Trial with 4 Power Tokens.

powerAddons.name: Worry Stone
powerAddons.description:
While the Ottomarians were told to think only positive thoughts, some kept these stones in their pockets to rub when negative thoughts arose.
Reveals the Aura of a Survivor for 6 seconds when they lock a Locker.

powerAddons.name: War Helmet
powerAddons.description:
While investigating an Overlap in the Alps, she found an abandoned war bunker.She took a helmet from it after the Overlap nearly took her.
Increases the duration of Killer Instinct by +1.5 seconds during Nightfall.

powerAddons.name: Ottomarian Writing
powerAddons.description:
The words of Otto Stamper were the only words available for his followers to read, decrying malthink and malspeak.
Reduces the Cool-down duration of The Gloaming by -4 seconds during Daytime.

powerAddons.name: Destroyed Pillow
powerAddons.description:
While not allowed to sleep, leaders amongst the Ottomarians tore sleeping supplies to shreds to prevent malthinkers from sneaking off to nap.
Reduces the Cool-down duration of The Gloaming by -2.5 seconds during Nightfall.

powerAddons.name: Broken Doll
powerAddons.description:
Followers brought their families to live in a utopia.None of them were spared.
Increases the duration of Nightfall by 20 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Tilling Blade
powerAddons.description:
The island was self-sufficient, and followers tilled the tough soil to grow crops during the warm season.
Healthy Survivors injured during Nightfall suffer from the Blindness, Haemorrhage, and the Mangled Status Effects for 60 seconds.
"Like a predatory beast, it can smell and track blood."

powerAddons.name: Lavalier Microphone
powerAddons.description:
She kept a lavalier mic nearby, allowing her to record her innermost feelings when under great stress.
Consuming the last Power Token will reveal the Auras of all Survivors for 3 seconds.
Entering a Locker through teleportation causes all Lockers within 6 metres of any Survivor to open and slam their doors.

powerAddons.name: Field Recorder
powerAddons.description:
Haddie documented all of her forays near Overlaps, to prove not only to the world but herself what she saw and felt.
Nightfall is active at the start of the Trial.
Nightfall activates automatically when the final Generator is completed.
Any Survivor coming into contact with the Remnant suffers from the Exhausted Status Effect for 15 seconds.

powerAddons.name: Boat Key
powerAddons.description:
Only one boat allowed people on and off the island, and the keys were hidden away to prevent deserters.
Increases the Teleportation speed by +25 % during Daytime.
When all Generators are completed, all active Locks are instantly broken.

powerAddons.name: Sacrificial Knife
powerAddons.description:
When a journalist attempted to warn the Ottomarians of Stamper's true task, he slit her throat as a warning to any dissenters.
Exiting a Locker during Nightfall blocks all Vault locations within 16 metres of it for 5 seconds.
"There are imposters amongst you! They intend to destroy our perfect home with dark thoughts. Find them and bring them to me!" — Otto Stamper

powerAddons.name: Iridescent Wooden Plank
powerAddons.description:
Once the journalist's blood stained the wooden boards of the stage, everything was set into motion for The Dredge's arrival.
Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for the final 12 seconds of Nightfall.
"She came here to poison your minds with fear! Do not let the fear in!" — Otto Stamper
